translation.en: [woman] Some people gravitate towards no.
Some people naturally lean towards yes.
translation.zh: ‎有些人则天生就倾向于说“好”

translation.en: I said yes to everything.
I'm up! Yes!
Come on! Hop on!
[laughs] Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes!
-Allison? -[Allison] And when I met Carlos…
-You're Allison? -Yes.
I think I got your coffee. I took a sip. You mind?
translation.zh:
‎这好像是你的咖啡
‎我喝了一口 你介意吗？

translation.en: [Allison] …it was like finding a partner in yes.
translation.zh: ‎感觉就像是找到了我的“好”搭档

translation.en: -Arepa pabellón. -Arepa parió.
translation.zh:
‎-帕贝隆玉米饼
‎-帕利欧玉米饼

translation.en: -Pabellón. Yeah. -Pabellón. Yeah.
Hey, should we play hooky and go to the beach?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我们要不要翘班去海滩玩？

translation.en: [muffled] Yes! I'm ready.
-You think? Yeah. -Yeah.
Do you wanna meet my parents?
Oh, yeah, I wanna meet your parents.
translation.zh: ‎好啊 我当然想见你父母了

translation.en: Wanna go rock climbing?
-[Allison yells] -[Carlos] Allison!
I'm coming! Carlos! Carlos!
I'm coming. Come here. Come. Come.
[Allison] Yes was like the theme of our relationship.
-Allison, do you take Carlos-- -Yes! Yes! Yes!
translation.zh:
‎-艾莉森 你愿意嫁给卡洛斯…
‎-好 我愿意！

translation.en: -[officiant] Carlos, do you take-- -Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes!
translation.zh:
‎-卡洛斯 你愿意娶…
‎-好 当然愿意！

translation.en: [Allison] And although having kids is the best thing that's ever happened to us…
translation.zh: ‎虽然有了孩子是我们此生最大的幸福

translation.en: [Allison] …no became the new yes.
Oh, no, no, no.
-[kids] Four, three, two, one. -[Allison] No, no, no, no. No, no, no, no.
But no is part of the job.
No is the light.
-No is the answer. -Hey! No! No, no, no!
Come on! Layla's parents let her!
No, no, no, no, no. Ah-ah-ah. No.
Okay, guys, screen time's over.
translation.zh: ‎好了 大家 屏幕时间结束了

translation.en: -Wait, no, no. Wait. Five more minutes. -Nope.
translation.zh:
‎-不 等一下 多五分钟
‎-不行

translation.en: Hey! Mom! Mom, Mom. Mom, Mom!
[Allison] Saying no 50 times an hour?
No! Absolutely not!
Nope on a rope!
Nando?
Katie, you're kidding me. You've done half of your homework.
translation.zh:
‎凯蒂 你在开玩笑吧？
‎你的作业只写了一半

translation.en: No!
No way, no how, not by a long shot,
under no circumstances, not in a million years, no!
translation.zh:
‎在任何情况下
‎即使天塌下来也不行！

translation.en: [Allison] It's called parenting.
Hey, Cheryl, how's it going? Good morning.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 雪莉  你好吗？早上好

translation.en: Hey, listen, I have a quick question.
Um, I have a job interview this afternoon.
I was wondering if you could take Ellie for a couple of hours after school?
translation.zh:
‎不知道放学后
‎你能不能帮我照看爱丽几个小时？

translation.en: What about the Girl Scouts?
Okay, put us down for three boxes of Samoas.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 给我们留三盒萨摩亚饼干

translation.en: Tagalongs? Who likes Tagalongs?
translation.zh: ‎花生酱馅饼？谁喜欢那东西啊？

translation.en: Okay, put me down. Ten boxes.
Cheryl Nelson is shaking me down.
Yep, I'll… I'll wait.
Mom? Fleekfest? Dad said he's okay with me going if you are.
translation.zh: ‎妈？闪光音乐节？ ‎爸说只要你同意让我去 他就同意

translation.en: Oh, he did?
Wait, you're going to a freak fest?
translation.zh: ‎等等 你要去参加傻瓜音乐节啊？

translation.en: Awesome. You can finally be with your people.
translation.zh: ‎太棒了 你终于能和同类在一起了

translation.en: It's called Fleekfest. It's a music festival. It's cool.
translation.zh: ‎是闪光音乐节 是个很酷的音乐节

translation.en: I guess if you think it's cool, I'm sure it's super cool.
translation.zh:
‎你觉得很酷的话
‎那肯定超级无敌霹雳酷吧

translation.en: -Did you hear what I asked? -Yeah, you're 14.
translation.zh:
‎-你听到我问什么了吗？
‎-小姐 你才14岁

translation.en: You can't go without a parent.
Hi. You can? I'll put a blue note and the check in her backpack. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎嗨 可以吧？ ‎我会把蓝色纸条和支票
‎放在她的背包里 谢谢

translation.en: Nobody wants to go to a music festival with their parent.
translation.zh: ‎没人想和自己的父母一起去音乐节

translation.en: Dad, please help! Mom.
What… What? She said no?
If your mother says no, it's no, sweetie.
translation.zh: ‎你妈说不行就不行了 亲爱的

translation.en: Really? Don't you mean if we say no?
Guys? Watch this.
I think I put the right amount of baking soda in this time.
translation.zh: ‎这次苏打粉的份量应该拿捏准了

translation.en: Get ready for a waffle volcano in three, two…
translation.zh: ‎华夫饼火山要爆发咯 三、二…

translation.en: Must've mixed the catalyst wrong.
You'll get it next time.
translation.zh: ‎下次一定会成功的 儿子

translation.en: Can I sign your math homework?
translation.zh: ‎我能给你的数学作业签字吗？

translation.en: Duh. Yeah, you can sign all my homework, except for math. Whoops.
translation.zh:
‎当然啊 你能给我所有的作业签字
‎就除了数学作业 哎呦不行

translation.en: -You told me you finished everything. -Hey, don't worry.
translation.zh: ‎昨晚你告诉我 作业都写完了 ‎嘿 别担心

translation.en: I get by on my charm.
Honey, I'm gonna stop by the gym after work, okay?
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的
‎下班后我要去一下健身房 好吗？

translation.en: I need to keep sculpting the Carlos.
-Tonight? You're stopping by the gym? -Yeah. Tonight.
translation.zh:
‎-你今晚要去健身房？
‎-对 今晚

translation.en: -Really? Tonight? -[Carlos] Tonight.
Oh. Tonight? No, no, not tonight. No, tonight is, um, is our…
translation.zh: ‎今晚？当然不是今晚 今晚是我们的…

translation.en: -Your… The kids'… Uh… -Come on.
-Anniver… Birthday? Soccer? -Really? Come on. You can do it.
translation.zh:
‎纪念日？生日？ ‎-不是吧 你可以的
‎-足球赛？

translation.en: -Parent-teacher night, Daddy. -Ah. That one. Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎家长教师会议 爸爸 ‎对 就是那个

translation.en: I don't understand how you can open this refrigerator ten times a day
translation.zh: ‎我真不明白你怎么能一天开十次冰箱

translation.en: and not see this beautiful calendar.
Eh, because it's gotten a little over-complicated.
-It hurts my eyes. -[Carlos] Growing up, things were simple.
translation.zh: ‎看得我眼睛疼 ‎我小时候一切都很简单

translation.en: You wake up, go to school or work, and then you have to--
translation.zh:
‎你起床 去上学或上班
‎然后就能腾出时间…

translation.en: I know how to twerk.
-Does she mean twerk twerk? -"To work," not "twerk." Is she twerking?
translation.zh:
‎-她是说电臀吗？
‎-我说“腾”  不是“臀”

translation.en: [Katie] She totally is.
translation.zh:
‎-她在扭臀吗？
‎-没错 ‎爱丽 不行！

translation.en: -[Allison] No! -Not side to side, Ellie. Up and down.
translation.zh: ‎不是左右扭 爱丽 是上下扭

translation.en: -Let me show you. -Katie. No.
-[Carlos] Do you want me to… -No!
Really loosen your hips.
Nobody's loosening their hips. Child!
translation.zh: ‎不用放松什么臀部 孩子们

translation.en: Really pop it, Ellie.
[Allison] Carlos, help me out!
Yo. You gotta shake your body.
Come on. Pop it, Ellie!
Nobody's popping it! We are late!
translation.zh: ‎谁都不用扭 我们要迟到了！

translation.en: Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
Yes!
The catalyst!
I mean, I'm so sorry.
You can put on your music if you want, Daddy. I don't mind.
translation.zh: ‎你可以放你的音乐 爸爸 我不介意

translation.en: -Really, honey? -Yup.
Okay. Thank you.
♪ Oh, I'm a gummy bear Yes, I'm a gummy bear ♪
translation.zh: ‎喔 我是软糖熊 对 我是软糖熊

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I'm a yummy, tummy, funny Lucky gummy bear ♪
translation.zh: ‎我是美味可口、幽默、幸运的软糖熊

translation.en: ♪ Oh yeah, gummy, gummy Gummy, gummy, gummy bear ♪
translation.zh: ‎软糖 软糖 软糖 软糖 软糖熊

translation.en: ♪ Gummy, gummy, gummy, gummy, gummy bear ♪
translation.zh: ‎软糖 软糖 软糖 软糖 软糖熊

translation.en: [girl] So, what'd she say?
Bad news, Lay. Mom gave a thumbs-down to Fleekfest.
translation.zh: ‎坏消息 蕾拉 ‎妈不让我去闪光音乐节

translation.en: [Layla] What?
But your mom's so smart and cool and gorgeous.
translation.zh: ‎但你妈妈又聪明又酷 而且美爆了

translation.en: I know.
Sometimes I'm like, "Is she my mom, or is she a runway model?"
translation.zh:
‎有时候我会想
‎她到底是我妈妈还是个超模？

translation.en: If I'm so great, you won't mind me coming with you, then you can go.
translation.zh:
‎如果我真这么棒
‎你就不会介意我也一起去 ‎那你就能去咯

translation.en: Yeah, no, thanks.
Never mind.
I don't get it. I took you two to Taylor Swift a couple of years ago.
translation.zh:
‎我不明白 几年前我带你俩
‎去看泰勒斯威夫特的演唱会

translation.en: We had a blast.
-I was 12 then. I was a little tween. -[laughs]
translation.zh: ‎我那时才12岁 是个小少女

translation.en: Dad said I could go. He believes in me. He knows I can handle myself.
translation.zh: ‎爸说我可以去 ‎他对我有信心 他知道我能照顾自己

translation.en: Your dad just wants to be the good guy because he knows that I will say no.
translation.zh:
‎你爸只是想做好人
‎因为他知道我不会允许的

translation.en: And I do believe in you.
It's just that concerts like Fleekfest bring out
translation.zh: ‎只是像闪光音乐节这样的演唱会

translation.en: a whole world of people you have not been exposed to yet.
translation.zh: ‎会让你接触到很多你未曾接触过的人

translation.en: And it's not gonna happen without a parent.
translation.zh: ‎而这必须在父母的陪同下发生

translation.en: Well, when will I be able to go to concerts alone?
translation.zh: ‎那我什么时候才能自己去看演唱会？

translation.en: Never. You will always have to go to concerts with me your whole life.
translation.zh:
‎永远都不行
‎你这辈子都要和我一起去看演唱会

translation.en: -Even when I'm your age? -Especially when you're my age.
translation.zh:
‎-即使到了你这把年纪？
‎-特别是那个时候

translation.en: You will love it because you love me.
translation.zh: ‎而且你绝对会喜欢 因为你爱我

translation.en: Four more years. Four more years. Four more years. ♪ Baby I need your loving ♪
Mom, no.
-My ears are bleeding. -Mom!
What is it with you and this song?
Because you love this song.
-I sang it when you were a baby. -[Katie] I'm not a baby.
translation.zh:
‎-你小时候我唱过给你听的
‎-我不小了

translation.en: Okay, I better… I better turn it down for the school drop-off.
translation.zh: ‎好 该调低音量了 快到学校了

translation.en: I don't wanna go to school today.
I don't wanna drop you off, but I have to.
translation.zh:
‎我也不想送你去学校
‎但我不得不这么做

translation.en: You have to go to school, and I have to go to work.
translation.zh: ‎你得去上学 我得去上班

translation.en: -No. -Yes. -No. -Yes. -No. -Yes. -No. -Yes. -No. -Yes.
[Carlos] No drones inside, for the 50th time!
translation.zh:
‎我说过50次了
‎不准在室内飞无人机！

translation.en: [man] Sorry, Mom.
Hey, Mr. Torres. I… I promise this never happens.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 托雷斯先生
‎我发誓这从来没发生过

translation.en: Look. Hey, I fixed it. It's working. I fixed--
translation.zh: ‎你看 我修好了 没问题了 ‎嘿 我修好了

translation.en: [Carlos] Guys. Guys, it's too loud.
Guys! Joan?
Guys! Guys!
[panting] It's still way too loud.
But the ads are going to say these speakers will melt your brains.
translation.zh:
‎但广告会说
‎这些喇叭会让你嗨到大脑融化的

translation.en: -That wouldn't hold up with a waiver. -Fine.
translation.zh:
‎-有免责声明那就不成立了
‎-好吧

translation.en: [groans] Boo.
My job is to keep us from getting sued. Bring the decibel level down.
translation.zh: ‎我的职责是不让我们被起诉 ‎把分贝值降下来

translation.en: Also, you're not supposed to bring food in a testing area.
translation.zh: ‎还有 你们不应该把食物带进测试区

translation.en: I have to ask you to throw the McGriddle away.
translation.zh: ‎我得请你把那个煎松饼扔了

translation.en: [Carlos] Joan? Both of you.
[sighs] Mine's finished.
Look, I hate saying no, but it's my job. Okay?
translation.zh:
‎听着 我也讨厌说“不”
‎但那是我的职责 好吗？

translation.en: -[man] Mrs. Torres? Hi. -Hi.
[interviewer] You were VP of marketing at Kulger Food?
translation.zh:
‎-你曾是酷格食品的营销副总？
‎-对 担任了很多年

translation.en: For a long time. I loved that job,
translation.zh:
‎-你曾是酷格食品的营销副总？
‎-对 担任了很多年 ‎我很喜欢那份工作

translation.en: but then I had kids, and for a while, it was just too much.
translation.zh:
‎但后来我有了孩子
‎有一阵子真的兼顾不来

translation.en: I bet you're better at multitasking.
translation.zh: ‎那你一定很擅长多重任务处理

translation.en: I never stopped working. I just stopped getting paid for it.
translation.zh:
‎老实说 我根本没停止过工作
‎只是不再领工资而已

translation.en: I get it. I mean, I'm a mom too.
translation.zh: ‎我明白 我自己也是妈妈

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah. Of course you are.
I mean, call me crazy, but this feels so nice.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 说我疯狂也好 但这感觉真棒

translation.en: What do you think?
Listen, I would love to hire you for something. I would, but--
translation.zh: ‎听着 我真的很想雇用你 真的 但是…

translation.en: -Oh, I'm so glad. -Allison, this is an entry-level position.
translation.zh: ‎噢 太好了 ‎艾莉森 这是个入门级职位

translation.en: I mean, I'm looking for some entitled millennial
translation.zh:
‎我想找的是
‎一个自我感觉良好的千禧一代

translation.en: who I'd keep here until 10:00 every night.
Every night.
[interviewer] Who I could watch cry while eating a gluten-free burrito
translation.zh: ‎然后看着她边哭边吃她的无麸质卷饼

translation.en: and hashtags, "Hurt feelings. This job is so unfair."
translation.zh:
‎边发推文抱怨：
‎“#工作不公平 #好委屈”

translation.en: I wouldn't want to do that to you.
I like you too much.
I like you too.
-[Carlos] I'm sorry about the job, honey. -[Allison] Oh, it's fine.
translation.zh: ‎工作的事我很抱歉 亲爱的 ‎哦 没事

translation.en: I don't know that I'm still passionate about marketing anyway.
translation.zh:
‎反正我也不确定
‎我对营销是否还充满热情

translation.en: Not enough to cry into my gluten-free burrito.
translation.zh: ‎还不足以让我啃着无麸质卷饼哭泣

translation.en: Hey. If I'm gonna go back to work,
I need to make sure our kids are okay without me first.
translation.zh: ‎我得先确定孩子们没有我也没事

translation.en: Hi, Mr. and Mrs. Torres.
translation.zh: ‎你们好 托雷斯先生和太太

translation.en: -[man] Please, take a seat. -Thank you. We're getting two for one.
translation.zh: ‎请坐吧 ‎谢谢 哇 左右开弓呢

translation.en: -I guess we'll be home early. -[chuckling]
Is this about Nando's grades? Because we are working on focus--
translation.zh:
‎这和南多的成绩有关吗？
‎因为我们正努力加强…

translation.en: Uh, it's not about Nando's grades, although, uh, they're not great.
translation.zh:
‎这不是关于南多的成绩
‎虽然说他的成绩并不理想

translation.en: Oh. Getting better.
We wanted to meet with you together
because, uh, we've noticed a common theme in Katie and Nando's schoolwork.
translation.zh:
‎是因为我们注意到
‎凯蒂和南多的作业有个共同的主题

translation.en: What's the common theme?
Well, here's a haiku Katie wrote in my English class.
translation.zh:
‎这是凯蒂
‎在我的英语课上写的一首俳句

translation.en: "A caged bird am I.
My mother, my sweet captor.
Mother, let me fly."
"Mother, my sweet captor.
-Mother, let me fly." -Five, seven, five. She nailed it. Haiku.
translation.zh:
‎-“娘 让我飞吧 ”
‎-五-七-五 没错 是俳句

translation.en: I didn't think much of it at first,
translation.zh: ‎老实说 我一开始并没多想

translation.en: until Mr. Chan told me about a video that Nando made for his history class.
translation.zh:
‎直到陈老师告诉我
‎南多为他的历史课做了个视频

translation.en: He made a video? That's pretty cool.
Let's just have a look at the video.
[Nando] The following program is intended for mature audiences only.
It contains violence, adult language, and nudity.
translation.zh: ‎它包含暴力、粗俗言语和裸露镜头

translation.en: Viewer discretion is advised.
Don't worry. There's no nudity.
-Oh, okay. -[scoffs]
[Nando] Stalin, Mussolini,
and Mom.
My mother might not have had anyone tortured or killed…
translation.zh: ‎我妈也许没折磨过或杀过任何人…

translation.en: Not yet.
[Nando] …but in our house, she's no less of a dictator.
translation.zh:
‎但在我们家
‎她是个不折不扣的独裁者

translation.en: So now I'm a dictator.
I'm not asking twice, Nando. You will do what I say, when I say it.
translation.zh: ‎我不会说第二遍 南多 ‎我让你做什么 你就得做什么

translation.en: I'm your mother. I don't need a reason.
translation.zh: ‎我是你妈妈 我不需要理由

translation.en: I don't, so…
[Nando] Her goal, maximum oppression.
translation.zh: ‎她的目标是最大限度地镇压

translation.en: You're not going till you finish your homework.
translation.zh: ‎写完作业前你哪儿也别想去

translation.en: I mean, that's parenting.
Stop. It's like 1984 in this house. Big Mother is always watching.
translation.zh:
‎站住 ‎这家里跟《1984》没两样
‎老母亲一直在盯着你

translation.en: I like that nickname. It's tough.
Why can't Miss Hoffling ever assign a happy book?
translation.zh:
‎霍芙琳老师
‎就不能布置些快乐的书吗？

translation.en: [scoffs] Okay. They are depressing. Have you ever read Little Women?
translation.zh: ‎它们真的很令人沮丧嘛 ‎你看过《小妇人》吗？

translation.en: She gets scarlet fever.
-The Little Prince? -[Hoffling] He has no family.
Harry Potter's an orphan. There are no happy books.
translation.zh:
‎哈利波特是个孤儿
‎根本就没有快乐的书

translation.en: Don't walk away from me.
[roaring] Nando!
[Carlos] Where are you going?
Oh, come on, honey. You can make anyone look bad with editing.
translation.zh: ‎别这样嘛 亲爱的 ‎剪辑能让任何人看起来像坏人

translation.en: -You make me look bad. -Me? Why me?
translation.zh:
‎-你让我看起来像坏人
‎-我？为什么？

translation.en: Because you get to be the fun dad everybody loves,
translation.zh: ‎因为你能当大家都喜欢的有趣老爸

translation.en: and I am stuck being the bad cop.
You didn't see the dad as the villain in that video, did you?
translation.zh: ‎你没看到那视频里的反派是爸爸吧？

translation.en: It'll probably get uploaded to YouTube. Then I'll just be the viral psycho mom.
translation.zh: ‎说不定会被上传到YouTube ‎然后我就会变成家喻户晓的疯子妈妈

translation.en: How'd you get to be the fun one? I was the fun one.
translation.zh:
‎你怎么成了有趣的那个？
‎我才总是有趣的那个

translation.en: Look, Ally, I am the bad guy all day at work.
translation.zh:
‎听着 艾莉森
‎我每天工作时都得当坏人

translation.en: Every time I walk into that office, people stop laughing and leave the room,
translation.zh:
‎我每次走进办公室
‎大家就会停止说笑 然后走出去

translation.en: but when I come home, the kids, they actually smile when they see me.
translation.zh:
‎但当我回到家时
‎孩子们看到我都会开心地笑

translation.en: Yeah. Well, it's not fair.
I hear myself with the kids, and I think I wouldn't even hang out with me.
translation.zh:
‎看着自己带孩子的那副样子
‎连我都不想跟自己相处了

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I have a suggestion.
Sorry, I didn't mean to frighten you. I was just eavesdropping or spying.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我不是有意要吓你们的 ‎我只是在偷听 或者偷看

translation.en: There are so many parents out there, and I come in here to hide,
translation.zh:
‎外面有好多家长
‎所以我就进来这里躲

translation.en: and then I got really hungry, so I made a huge thing of tots.
translation.zh:
‎躲着躲着就肚子饿了
‎所以就弄了一堆炸薯球

translation.en: [chuckles] Would you guys care for a tot?
Do you want a tot? A hot tot?
translation.zh: ‎要炸薯球吗？热腾腾的炸薯球？

translation.en: Come here. Have a hot tot.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 吃个热腾腾的炸薯球

translation.en: Have a tot. They're perfectly lukewarm.
translation.zh: ‎两位 吃个炸薯球吧 这温度正好

translation.en: Who are you?
It's Mr. Deacon. Katie and Nando's guidance counselor.
translation.zh:
‎他是迪肯老师
‎凯蒂和南多的指导顾问

translation.en: Yes, but thanks to budget cuts, I'm also the PE teacher/football coach.
translation.zh:
‎是 但由于预算削减
‎我也是体育老师兼橄榄球教练

translation.en: Go, Cougars! Shoot the layup for the touchdown. [scoffs]
translation.zh: ‎美洲狮队 加油！ ‎上篮然后触地得分

translation.en: I don't know anything about sports. No, I was a science major.
translation.zh: ‎我对体育一窍不通 ‎我是理科出身的

translation.en: I specialized in the gastrointestinal behavior of field mice.
translation.zh: ‎我专门研究田鼠的肠胃行为

translation.en: But I do know a thing or two about parenting,
translation.zh: ‎不过我对育儿这事还是有些了解的

translation.en: both professionally and personally.
translation.zh: ‎无论是从专业还是个人方面来说

translation.en: I have six beautiful kids at home.
Timmy, Tommy, Tonya, Tanya, Tyson, and Doug.
translation.zh:
‎蒂米、汤米、谭雅、唐雅
‎泰森和道格

translation.en: How come you look like you're just back from Tahiti?
translation.zh:
‎你怎么会看起来
‎像刚从大溪地度假回来？

translation.en: You want to know what my secret is?
I give my kids Yes Days.
translation.zh: ‎我给我的孩子们“有求必应日”

translation.en: Yes Days? What's a Yes Day?
You pick a day in the not-too-distant future,
translation.zh: ‎你挑个在不远的将来的日子

translation.en: and for 24 hours, you say yes to everything that your kids want.
translation.zh: ‎在那24小时内  ‎对孩子们的所有要求都说“好”

translation.en: -[Carlos] Really? -Yeah.
-Are you serious? -What, you say yes to everything?
translation.zh:
‎-你是认真的吗？
‎-等等 ‎什么都答应吗？

translation.en: Well, you set some ground rules.
They can't ask for something in the future,
and they can't kill anybody, obvi.
translation.zh: ‎而且不能杀人 这是当然

translation.en: I know it sounds crazy, but it is a true game changer.
translation.zh:
‎我知道这听起来很疯狂
‎但它真的会彻底改变一切

translation.en: They liberate kids and give them a rare sense of autonomy,
translation.zh:
‎可以解放孩子们
‎给予他们少有的自主感

translation.en: and it sets the parents free too.
Yeah, Mr. Coach Deacon,
I would love to just take a day off from being a mom
translation.zh: ‎我非常想放假一天不当妈妈

translation.en: and let my kids do whatever they want,
but I'd also love to find a rainbow unicorn and fly it to the moon.
translation.zh:
‎但我也很想找到一只彩虹独角兽
‎然后骑着它飞上月球

translation.en: Then I think you'd want a pegasus.
More of a pegacorn.
The point is, you don't know our kids.
translation.zh: ‎重点是 你不了解我们的孩子

translation.en: Oh, these tots have turned.
If we tried what you're proposing,
it… it would be apocalyptic.
You're right. I don't know your kids. I don't know everything,
translation.zh: ‎你说得对 我不了解你的孩子 ‎我也不是什么都知道

translation.en: but…
I will say this.
You should say yes to a Yes Day.
translation.zh: ‎你应该尝试一下有求必应日

translation.en: Ooh! Meatloaf!
"Kids who are given Yes Days consume less sugar,"
translation.zh:
‎“被给予有求必应日的孩子
‎糖分摄取量较低”

translation.en: not really, "and spend less time on the Internet."
It doesn't make sense. You're not falling for this?
translation.zh: ‎这根本没道理 你不会真信了吧？

translation.en: Everything happens for a reason.
Maybe there's a reason that guy showed up with those tater tots.
translation.zh:
‎也许那家伙带着炸薯球出现
‎是有原因的

translation.en: Maybe by being a little less serious, we can make things better.
translation.zh:
‎也许不那么严肃
‎真的能让事情好起来

translation.en: I mean, you said it yourself.
We've been trying to do it the right way. Maybe it's time to try something new.
translation.zh: ‎我们一直在努力找合适的育儿法 ‎也许该尝试点新东西了

translation.en: So? Tired of hearing how great I am?
translation.zh: ‎怎么样？听腻了我有多厉害吗？

translation.en: You want to give Steven Spielberg here a Yes Day?
translation.zh:
‎你想给这位斯皮尔伯格导演
‎一个有求必应日？

translation.en: What's a Yes Day?
This new thing where parents agree
to say yes to everything their kids ask for for 24 hours.
translation.zh:
‎长达24小时
‎父母将答应孩子的所有要求

translation.en: -Radical! -How am I just hearing about this?
translation.zh:
‎-太激进了！
‎-我怎么现在才知道？

translation.en: Well, don't get too excited. Mom probably won't let us have one anyway.
translation.zh: ‎别高兴得太早 妈大概也不会答应

translation.en: Well, what does that mean? Why wouldn't I?
translation.zh: ‎那是什么意思？我为什么不会？

translation.en: [Katie] Yes Days are, like, fun.
And you're, like, a fun killer.
-Oh. -Come on, Katie, your mom is plenty fun.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 凯蒂 你妈妈可有趣了

translation.en: She is fun.
I have had a very long day, and I'm gonna go to bed.
translation.zh: ‎我今天真的很累 我先去睡了

translation.en: -So, good night. -[Carlos] No, we…
We still need to…
-[Allison] It's okay. -Honey? Tell your mom she's fun.
translation.zh:
‎-没关系
‎-亲爱的 ‎喂 快告诉你妈 她很有趣

translation.en: -Nando? -You told us never to lie.
Yeah, Daddy.
Hey, guys.
[whispers] Hey.
Of course you think your mom can't be fun. You don't even know me.
translation.zh:
‎你们当然觉得我无趣了
‎你们根本就不了解我

translation.en: I invented fun. I… I used to be the funnest person I knew.
translation.zh:
‎乐趣是我创造的
‎我曾是我所见过最有趣的人

translation.en: What happened?
What happened was I had three babies that had to be kept safe and alive.
translation.zh:
‎后来我生了三个
‎我必须养活和保护的娃

translation.en: It was a lot of pressure, but that's not the point.
translation.zh: ‎那压力挺大的 但那不是重点

translation.en: The point is, I can be fun again.
translation.zh: ‎重点是 我可以再次变得有趣

translation.en: Mom, really? There's no way.
[clicks tongue] I'll have a Yes Day.
We will have a super time.
Just you watch and see.
Mama can haiku too.
Sorry, but you couldn't make it through a Yes Morning, let alone a Yes Day.
translation.zh:
‎不好意思
‎你连个有求必应早上都做不到 ‎更别说一整天了

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Would you like to have a little wager on that?
Know what? I'd love to.
-[Allison] Hmph. -How about this?
If you say no one time,
I get to go to Fleekfest with Layla. No adults, no parents.
translation.zh:
‎我就可以和蕾拉一起去闪光音乐节
‎没有大人 没有父母

translation.en: Just us young, underage, vulnerable girls.
translation.zh:
‎只有我们两个
‎年轻、未成年的脆弱女孩

translation.en: Wait, honey. Are you sure?
translation.zh: ‎等等 亲爱的 你确定吗？

translation.en: I'll take your wager, missy,
translation.zh: ‎我接受你的赌注 大小姐

translation.en: because I know that I won't say no.
And when you lose, and you will lose,
translation.zh: ‎如果你输了 而你输定了

translation.en: I am so fun that you will still get to go to your concert.
translation.zh:
‎你还是可以去看演唱会
‎因为我太有趣了

translation.en: -Really? -Absolutely.
With me.
I'll sit next to you, and we'll hold hands.
translation.zh: ‎我会坐在你旁边 我们会手牵手

translation.en: We'll put our hands in the air like we just don't care.
translation.zh: ‎我们会高举双手 疯狂地挥舞

translation.en: I want in on this.
Me too.
Let's do this.
[Allison] There are ground rules, though. The Yes Day has to be earned.
translation.zh: ‎不过呢 有一些基本规则 ‎有求必应日是需要争取的

translation.en: Do your chores.
Finish your homework.
You can do better.
[Allison] You can't ask to do anything dangerous or illegal, obviously.
translation.zh:
‎你们显然不能要求
‎做任何危险或非法的事

translation.en: -What are you guys up to over there? -Don't worry. It's totally safe.
translation.zh: ‎你们在做什么呢？ ‎别担心 这绝对安全

translation.en: [Allison] You'll each have a budget,
and you can't ask to travel more than 20 miles from home.
translation.zh:
‎而且不能要求去
‎离家超过32公里的地方

translation.en: So this rules out Magic Mountain, Japan, and all space tourism.
translation.zh:
‎所以这就排除了魔法山乐园
‎日本和所有的太空旅游

translation.en: Will you have to say yes to absolutely everything?
translation.zh: ‎你必须对所有一切都点头答应吗？

translation.en: Close, but there are some rules.
translation.zh: ‎差不多 但还是有规则的

translation.en: Oh man!
Yes, bud.
[Allison] But the last rule is the biggest,
translation.zh: ‎但最后一条规则是最重要的

translation.en: that this family has the most fun we've ever had in our entire lives.
translation.zh:
‎这一天必须是咱们家
‎这辈子玩得最开心的一天

translation.en: Any second. Any second. Any second. Any second. Any second.
It's Yes Day!
Everybody, wake up!
All right.
Come on, you sleepyheads. Get up! Come on.
translation.zh: ‎快点 你们两个瞌睡虫 快起床！

translation.en: Nando, it's too early. We have the whole day. Go back to bed.
translation.zh: ‎南多 太早了 ‎我们有一整天的时间 回去睡觉吧

translation.en: Mom?
-Having regrets, Mom? -Mom?
[Katie] Look, she's so afraid, she can't even move.
translation.zh: ‎你看 她怕到动弹不得了

translation.en: What?
Who's ready for Yes Day? Whoo!
translation.zh: ‎谁准备好迎接有求必应日了？

translation.en: What've you done with our mother?
You know my rule about no bouncing on the bed?
translation.zh: ‎你们知道我说过不准在床上跳吧？

translation.en: Wanna bounce on the bed?
-Yes! -[Nando] Sure!
Do it! Do it!
I know you're too mature. It's okay. Whoo!
translation.zh:
‎我知道你已经长大了
‎不玩这个 没关系

translation.en: -[Nando] This is so much fun! -[Ellie] Nando!
Oh hi!
-Get up! -No!
[all] Get up!
-Wake up! -No! Get off!
[Nando] Yes Day!
Sorry, guys, no screen time today.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 两位 今天没有屏幕时间

translation.en: -Are you serious? -Sorry, Mama.
translation.zh:
‎-你在开玩笑吧？
‎-抱歉 妈咪

translation.en: The entire day you can't use anything that has a screen.
translation.zh: ‎你们今天不能使用任何有屏幕的东西

translation.en: That means no cell phones, no laptops, no iPads, nada.
translation.zh:
‎也就是说手机、笔记本和平板电脑
‎通通不准用

translation.en: What? Can I at least tell them that I'll be off the grid?
translation.zh:
‎什么？能至少
‎让我通知大家我要离网吗？

translation.en: -Please? -I'm not the boss.
Okay, fine. You have one minute.
-Starting 30 seconds ago. Come on! -Okay, okay!
translation.zh:
‎-30秒前就开始了 快点！
‎-好啦

translation.en: Hey, hey, don't ship the speakers until I get regulatory approval.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 在我获得监管部门的批准前
‎别把喇叭运出去

translation.en: Yeah, the speaker… You know what? Forget it. I'll text you.
translation.zh: ‎对 喇叭 ‎算了 我发短信给你吧

translation.en: Sorry, Dad. Time's up.
You knew to be prepared.
And we are so glad that you're so prepared.
translation.zh: ‎我们很高兴你做足了心理准备

translation.en: Ellie wants to get you dressed and do your hair and makeup.
translation.zh: ‎因为爱丽想为你挑衣服、梳妆打扮

translation.en: I have a vision.
Oh, but I have this shirt.
translation.zh: ‎（有求必应日） ‎但我特地穿了这件上衣耶

translation.en: -[Ellie] Sorry. -Ah.
I'm… I'm glad you're using your watercolors.
translation.zh: ‎我很高兴你选择用你的水彩颜料

translation.en: [Katie] Really get it everywhere.
-That's a great way to blend. -Yeah.
-Really? You want to use glitter? -Yep.
Really? She's gonna use glitter?
Should we make you look as crazy as possible?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得我们该
‎尽量让你看起来疯狂点吗？

translation.en: Yes.
-Should Nando skate in the house? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-你觉得南多该在屋里玩轮滑吗？
‎-好啊

translation.en: Do you think we should get a dog?
-Hang on, that's in the future. Nice try. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎等等 那是将来的事了 ‎-真有你的
‎-好吧

translation.en: -Oh yeah! Yeah. -Yeah! I love it! That is it.
-We love that one. -No.
No, no, no!
-Still not right! -Oh, come on, Ellie, that's perfect.
translation.zh:
‎-还是不对！
‎-得了吧 爱丽 这很棒啊

translation.en: That's the one!
Do you like it, Daddy?
I love it. This is the best makeover I've ever had.
translation.zh: ‎我超爱的 这是我做过最棒的大变身

translation.en: How many makeovers have you had?
Before this one?
None.
[Nando] Oh. Nice job, Ellie.
-Thank you. -What's that?
We made a list of our five big asks.
translation.zh: ‎我们列了个五大神秘任务的清单

translation.en: For the day to be a success, we have to make it through all five.
translation.zh:
‎必须完成所有五个任务
‎今天才算成功

translation.en: I love a list.
Number one!
-[Carlos] Is that Korean? -[Nando] Breakfast surprise!
To the Explorer!
-We gotta change first, right? -[Ellie] No!
translation.zh: ‎我们要先换衣服 对吧？ ‎不行！

translation.en: -Katie? -Right?
[Ellie] Nope on a rope.
Hey, kids, what is it with the sparklies around number five?
translation.zh:
‎孩子们 第五个任务
‎被亮片包围着是怎么回事？

translation.en: The main event.
The only thing that we can tell you about it is nothing.
translation.zh: ‎我们唯一能告诉你们的是“无可奉告”

translation.en: Not even a hint? The less you know, the better.
translation.zh:
‎-给个提示都不行？
‎-你们知道的越少越好

translation.en: Oh, okay.
I'll be gone for the main event. I'll be at Fleekfest.
translation.zh:
‎重头戏就不用算我了
‎那时候我会在闪光音乐节

translation.en: It's gonna be so much fun!
I've been memorizing all the lyrics to the H-E-R songs, and they're really good.
translation.zh:
‎我把H-E-R所有歌的歌词背下来了
‎她的歌真的很棒耶！

translation.en: Mom, it's H.E.R.
Oh, H.E.R.? Okay.
-Who's H.E.R.? -[Nando] This is H.E.R. on the radio.
She's the headliner for Fleekfest.
You know, Katie and my girls' night tonight.
translation.zh: ‎你知道的 我和凯蒂今晚的闺蜜之夜

translation.en: [Katie] You're not going.
Layla's cousin Julie's taking us. I told her she could have the ticket.
translation.zh:
‎蕾拉的表姐朱莉会带我们去
‎我已经答应把票给她了

translation.en: Oh, you might want to tell Layla's cousin Julie not to get her hopes up.
translation.zh:
‎你还是告诉蕾拉的表姐朱莉
‎别抱太大希望吧

translation.en: Last time I checked, it was a bet, and I'm gonna win.
translation.zh:
‎如果我没记错的话
‎我们打了个赌 而我赢定了

translation.en: No, you're not.
Yeah, I am.
-Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes. -[Katie] No. Not like that.
translation.zh: ‎是的 没错 ‎不 别这样

translation.en: -[Nando] So embarrassing. -Yes. Yes.
-Hi, we're celebrating our first-- -No! You can't tell him it's Yes Day.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 我们在庆祝我们的首个… ‎不行 不能告诉他今天是有求必应日

translation.en: Okay.
[Allison] Oh, coffee.
[Carlos] Ah, breakfast.
Hi. Where's the carnival? Looks like Burning Man.
translation.zh:
‎嗨 哪有狂欢节啊？
‎穿得像要去火人节似的

translation.en: What can I get you?
Some acai bowls? Smoothies?
-Yes. -We'd like that one, please.
The Gut Buster?
[Nando] Yeah, definitely!
Hey, it's $40.
Not if you finish it in under 30 minutes. Then it's free.
translation.zh: ‎如果在30分钟内吃完就是免费的

translation.en: -That is true. -What's in the Gut Buster?
translation.zh:
‎-没错
‎-翻江倒海碗里有什么啊？

translation.en: Ice cream!
-Oh boy. I wanted a cappuccino. -Oh my God. Wow.
translation.zh:
‎-天哪 我只想喝杯卡布奇诺
‎-哇塞

translation.en: Are you ready for this? -[Carlos] Okay. -[Ellie] Yes!
[Nando] There's blueberries. I love blueberries.
translation.zh: ‎还有蓝莓耶 我超爱蓝莓的

translation.en: I want it.
So you must eat everything inside the bowl and on the plate,
translation.zh: ‎你们必须把碗里和盘子里的一切吃完

translation.en: including ice cream, brownies, waffle cones--
translation.zh: ‎这包括冰淇淋、布朗尼、华夫蛋筒…

translation.en: What is this?
Oh, just a standard contract.
And how many people have lost their eyeballs?
You mean this month? Or all time?
translation.zh: ‎你是指这个月还是至今为止？

translation.en: He's a lawyer.
-Oh, is he? -Yeah, I'm a lawyer.
-You have 30 minutes to finish this. -[Carlos] Okay, ready.
translation.zh:
‎-你们有30分钟时间完成这项挑战
‎-准备好了

translation.en: I am looking forward to this.
Ready, set, go, go, go!
Ellie, go! Ellie, keep eating.
translation.zh: ‎爱丽 快吃！ ‎爱丽 别停下来

translation.en: [employee] You guys are doing great, but you have to pick up the pace.
translation.zh: ‎你们的表现很棒 但得加快步伐了

translation.en: It's a lot of ice cream.
[employee] Let's go! Keep it moving!
-[in slow motion] Brain freeze! -Help your brother.
The clown from your birthday party. Snakes in the toilet. Summer school!
translation.zh: ‎呃 你生日派对上的小丑 ‎厕所里的蛇 暑期学校！

translation.en: -Scaring's for hiccups. -Hold his nose!
translation.zh:
‎-吓人是治打嗝的
‎-捏住他的鼻子！

translation.en: -Pull hard on your tongue! -Also for hiccups!
translation.zh:
‎-用力拉你的舌头！
‎-那也是治打嗝的！

translation.en: [employee] Come on, family!
I can't do this anymore. It's getting gross.
translation.zh: ‎我吃不下了 我开始觉得恶心了

translation.en: [scoffs] I'm gonna explode.
I'm full.
Jeez, Dad. You're like a human ice cream vacuum.
translation.zh:
‎天啊 老爸
‎你简直是个人肉冰淇淋吸尘器

translation.en: I saw him eat like this once at a HomeTown Buffet when we were dating,
translation.zh:
‎咱们还在约会时
‎我曾见过他在家乡自助餐上这样吃

translation.en: and I knew it would pay off.
I'll take your spoon.
Daddy! Daddy!
Ten, nine,
eight, seven, six,
five, four, three, two, one!
[in Korean] Do you believe in miracles!
-[stomach rumbling] -Are you feeling okay?
-[Allison] That was so beautiful. -Is it coming up?
Uh, section 10 of the contract says vomiting voids the win.
translation.zh: ‎按合同第十条规定 呕吐则成绩作废

translation.en: -Keep it down, babe. You can do it. -Think of the family reputation.
translation.zh: ‎别吐 宝贝 你可以的 ‎想想我们家族的声誉

translation.en: Settle it right down.
Don't think of anything gross, like beef sticks.
translation.zh: ‎别想恶心的东西 例如牛肉棒

translation.en: -[Allison] You can do it. -It's up to you.
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-你可以的 ‎选择权在你 桶就在你面前

translation.en: There's a bucket there.
translation.zh: ‎选择权在你 桶就在你面前

translation.en: -I'm good. -He's fine. You got this.
translation.zh:
‎-不用了
‎-他没事 你可以的

translation.en: You have to hold it. Ah.
Well, we're officially losers.
-I am sorry. -Yeah, that doesn't sound good.
He didn't throw up! He didn't throw up!
It came out the other end!
You did it!
-[stomach rumbling] -Okay, kids.
Look at your father. Look at this man.
translation.zh: ‎看看你们爸爸 看看这个男人

translation.en: He is going down as a Yes Day legend.
translation.zh: ‎他将成为有求必应日的传奇人物

translation.en: Yes, but no more food, please, not today.
translation.zh: ‎是 但今天别再让我吃东西了 拜托

translation.en: Dad, it's gonna be super chill.
translation.zh: ‎爸 放心 这个超惬意的

translation.en: It's relaxing.
And sanitary.
What could be sanitary?
I don't know.
-Are we buying toilets? -[laughs] Oh no.
translation.zh: ‎我们要去买马桶吗？ ‎天哪 不是吧

translation.en: Oh, now this is what I'm talking about.
A car wash is like being reborn.
This is exactly what I needed, kids. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎这正是我需要的 孩子们 ‎-谢谢你们
‎-是啊

translation.en: -Yes. -Yeah.
Yeah. This one's easy.
Hey, guys. One more thing.
-Windows down! -What?
-Whoa, whoa, whoa. Whoa. -What?
Well, you have to. It's Yes Day.
translation.zh: ‎你们得答应啊 今天是有求必应日

translation.en: [gasps] What do we do?
I don't know. It's your car.
Come on, Mom. You can say it. One word. Two letters. N-O.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 妈 想说就说吧 ‎一句话 两个字 “不行”

translation.en: Windows down!
[man] No, no, no, no, no!
Oh my God! [screams]
Mommy, your makeup!
Yes Day! Oh my gosh!
Yes! Yes! Yes!
Yes Day!
I don't have to shower for a week!
You don't already!
-Will we make it through this day? -They might be trying to kill us.
translation.zh:
‎-我们能撑过今天吗？
‎-他们可能是想杀我们呢

translation.en: Ew. Nando, you're…
-Ugh. -Gross!
[Allison] An unexpected plus of a windows-down car wash,
translation.zh: ‎摇下车窗洗车有个意想不到的好处

translation.en: the mystery smell is finally gone.
translation.zh: ‎那股神秘的怪味终于消失了

translation.en: I'd love to know where I'm driving.
translation.zh: ‎我真的很想知道我正在开车去哪

translation.en: Oh, sorry, Dad. The rules say you're not allowed to know.
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 老爸
‎规则说你不能知道你要去哪儿

translation.en: Stop asking so many questions.
Oh, and, guys, so, new activity,
translation.zh: ‎对了 大家  ‎新活动‎ ‎新衣服

translation.en: new clothes.
Here you go, Katie.
And this is for Dad.
Are we starting a dance crew?
You wish we were starting a dance crew.
[Carlos] Seriously, what are we doing?
[Allison] Are those water balloons?
[Ellie] Kablowey!
-[Nando] Yeah! -What's Kablowey?
It's capture the flag meets paintball meets a butt ton of Kool-Aid.
translation.zh: ‎那是夺旗和彩弹射击的结合 ‎再加上大量的酷爱饮料

translation.en: A game Katie learned at camp. We played once with the kids in the neighborhood.
translation.zh: ‎是凯蒂在夏令营学到的游戏 ‎我们和邻居家小孩玩过一次

translation.en: [Katie] Yeah, Mom was the first one out. It was so embarrassing.
translation.zh: ‎对 妈是第一个出局的 ‎真是太丢人了

translation.en: [Nando] Only true warriors survive Kablowey.
translation.zh: ‎只有真正的勇士才能挺过大混战

translation.en: -It was a disaster. -Oh, but not today. Today we'll Kablowey.
translation.zh: ‎那次是一场灾难 ‎但今天不是 今天我们会克敌制胜

translation.en: -Today we'll Kablowey. -Yes!
[Allison] Where did you come up with all of these people?
translation.zh: ‎你们是从哪儿找来这些人的？

translation.en: We told them there'd be a casting director for a new, sexy, romantic reality show.
translation.zh: ‎我们告诉他们有个导演会来 ‎为新的性感浪漫真人秀进行选角

translation.en: That's you, Mom.
Yeah, Insatiable Island.
Come on, guys. Hey, guys!
[Allison] Insatiable Island? All right. I'm in it to win it. Let's do this!
translation.zh: ‎《心动夏令营》？ ‎好 我志在必胜 来吧！

translation.en: [Carlos] Hey.
Mr. Torres! You're on a Yes Day!
translation.zh: ‎托雷斯先生 你办了有求必应日！

translation.en: -Way to go! -Yeah, yeah. What are you doing here?
translation.zh:
‎-好样的！
‎-是啊 ‎你怎么会在这里？

translation.en: Nando asked me to be here. Yeah.
-I'm gonna referee. -You don't know anything about sports.
translation.zh: ‎我是今天的裁判 ‎你不是对体育一窍不通吗？

translation.en: I don't know anything about sports, but you can't say no on a Yes Day, right?
translation.zh: ‎我确实对体育一窍不通 ‎但有求必应日不能说“不”嘛

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay, get in your spot.
[Nando] Any of you jocks scared?
Well, you should be!
Anybody who wants to go home to their mommy, now's your chance.
translation.zh: ‎谁想回家找妈咪的话就趁现在

translation.en: Sir? Who should I give my headshot to, sir?
translation.zh: ‎先生 我该把我的头像交给谁？

translation.en: Sir, I was a runner-up season 12 on The Bachelorette, in case that helps.
translation.zh:
‎先生 自我推销一下
‎我是《单身女郎》第12季的亚军

translation.en: I was, uh, season 9.
Season 13.
Whatever!
Each team has a color of flag to protect. The goal is to catch the other team's flag
translation.zh: ‎各队都有不同颜色的旗子要保护 ‎游戏的目标是夺取另一队的旗子

translation.en: without getting hit by their Kool-Aid balloons.
translation.zh: ‎并且不被对方的酷爱水球击中

translation.en: If you get Kablowey-ed, you're eliminated.
translation.zh: ‎如果中弹了 你就会被淘汰

translation.en: When one team has all the flags, game's over.
translation.zh:
‎当一队拿到所有的旗子时
‎游戏就会结束

translation.en: Now, let's play some Kablowey!
translation.zh: ‎现在 让我们来场大混战吧！

translation.en: -[Allison] Big Blue! Big Blue! -[all] What? What?
-[Allison] Break it down. -[all] What?
Okay.
That's enough of that. That's a little awkward for everyone.
translation.zh: ‎够了 搞得大家都有点尴尬了

translation.en: All right, guys, here we go.
translation.zh: ‎好 各位 我们开始吧

translation.en: Get your team's flag and protect it like it's tots!
translation.zh:
‎拿好你们的队旗
‎把它当成炸薯球来保护！

translation.en: On the count of three, I want you to charge!
Three, two…
Wait. No, I screwed that up. Sorry.
translation.zh: ‎不 等等 我搞砸了 抱歉

translation.en: One, two…
-three! -[screaming]
Mom's our strongest enemy.
Let's go get her!
Don't worry about red.
My husband's on defense.
Don't worry about green. Katie's smart. She's gonna go after her dad. Run!
translation.zh: ‎也别担心绿队 凯蒂很聪明  ‎她会冲着她爸去 快跑！

translation.en: Okay, guys. Okay, just… Defense is the key. Okay?
translation.zh: ‎好 各位 防守是关键 知道吗？

translation.en: Wait out here. Let them eliminate each other. I know what I'm doing.
translation.zh:
‎在这儿等着 让他们互相消灭
‎这招绝对错不了

translation.en: Go, go! Red team. Red team. My dad's team first!
translation.zh: ‎干掉红队 先干掉我爸那一队！

translation.en: This is gonna be easy.
You with the hair thing, outta here!
You in the headband, you're out!
The other headband. [whistles]
-Should we take a selfie? -Yeah, sure.
-Sweet. -Tag me on Insta, 'kay?
-One, two, three. Insatiable Island! -Yeah!
Red team, what are you doing? It's a bloodbath!
translation.zh: ‎红队 你们在干嘛？ ‎这简直是场血战！

translation.en: Half your team is eliminated!
Hold on. Change of strategy. Run for your life. Billy, get out of here!
translation.zh:
‎等等 改变战略 ‎-赶紧逃命！
‎-比利 快跑！

translation.en: I love the smell of Kool-Aid in the morning.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢清晨空气中的酷爱饮料味道

translation.en: [Allison] Wait a minute. We're taking too many losses!
translation.zh: ‎等等 我们损失太惨重了！

translation.en: [whistles] You're out!
Too many casualties! Go back! Fall back!
Fall back, team!
New strategy.
Ma'am. Hi, my name's Eric.
translation.zh: ‎女士 你好 我是艾瑞克

translation.en: -I'm here to make muscles, not friends. -I'm more shredded. Check this out.
translation.zh: ‎我是来练肌肉的 不是来交友的 ‎我的肌肉更发达 你看

translation.en: I have a very relatable body. It's great for TV.
translation.zh: ‎我的身材平易近人 有利于收视率

translation.en: For TV. Insatiable Island. Put your clothes on.
translation.zh:
‎原来是为了《心动夏令营》
‎快穿好衣服

translation.en: We're getting killed. I need that bag.
translation.zh: ‎我们要被杀了 我需要那个袋子

translation.en: Load me up with ammo!
-Get her ammo! -Bring it!
Blue, who wiped your bottoms when you were babies?
translation.zh:
‎蓝队 你们小时候
‎是谁给你们擦屁股的？

translation.en: -My mom! -Our moms!
-Who tied your shoes when you were babies? -Our moms!
translation.zh: ‎你们小时候是谁给你们绑鞋带的？ ‎我们的妈妈！

translation.en: Fight for your mom!
-Go, Blue! -Go, Blue!
translation.zh:
‎-蓝队 上啊！
‎-蓝队 上啊！

translation.en: Nando, look out!
Nice job, Commander Ellie.
Yay!
You're out!
Go!
Do you see them?
Destroy my beautiful children!
You are going down!
[Katie] Oh, this is bad.
You wanted to make me a warrior?
translation.zh: ‎你们想让我成为勇士 是吧？

translation.en: I'm a warrior!
Listen, I think we need to team up to take her out.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我觉得我们得联手才能干掉她

translation.en: Deal. Is that fair?
All's fair in love and Kablowey.
translation.zh:
‎在爱情和大混战中
‎没有什么是不公平的

translation.en: Go for it.
That was perfect. It's messing her up.
translation.zh: ‎太棒了 你看 她完全乱了阵脚

translation.en: -Yeah. -Are you playing dirty, Nando?
translation.zh:
‎-是啊
‎-南多 你耍阴招 是吧？

translation.en: [Nando] I don't see her. Where is she?
Do you see which way she went?
[Nando] No, I didn't. Let's go.
Mom!
Yeah!
[coach] Oh wow! You got Kablowey-ed.
-Ah! -[coach] Ha-ha! You're done!
Mrs. Torres got the red flag!
If she gets the green flag, she wins!
translation.zh: ‎如果她拿到绿旗的话 她就赢了！

translation.en: -How'd you let that happen? -What?
Hey, Brian, can I use your phone for a sec?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 布莱恩 能借用下你的手机吗？

translation.en: I just gotta deal with a work thing.
Will you put in a good word with your wife?
translation.zh: ‎能帮我跟你老婆说几句好话吗？

translation.en: Sure.
Wait. Hold up. Hold up.
Mom, come on. It's over. You don't even have any balloons left.
translation.zh:
‎妈 别这样 已经结束了
‎你连水球都没有了

translation.en: [in Spanish] Then why is there fear in your eyes, daughter?
translation.zh: ‎那你为何眼里充满了恐惧 女儿？

translation.en: [in Spanish] No, no, you have more fear.
Tú.
No. ¡Tú!
-¡Tú! -¡Tú!
-[screams] -Wait!
That's my mom! That's my mom!
Whoo! We did it!
[in Spanish] Blue forever!
[in English] Yeah!
We shipped the nano-cams? We don't have clearance yet.
translation.zh:
‎纳米相机都运出去了？什么意思？
‎我们还没得到许可呢

translation.en: Tell Alan to issue a recall.
-[Ellie] Daddy? -Honey.
-Were you talking on a phone? -No. Phone? No, no.
translation.zh:
‎-你刚刚是在讲电话吗？
‎-电话？没有啊

translation.en: I was just out here looking at… Taking in the nature. I love nature.
translation.zh:
‎我只是在这里欣赏大自然而已
‎我超爱大自然的

translation.en: -Well, it looked like you were. -Nope, I wasn't.
translation.zh: ‎可你看起来像在讲电话 ‎不 我没有

translation.en: -No. -Daddy, do you hear that?
-What? -It must be coming from that bush.
translation.zh:
‎-听到什么？
‎-一定是从那个树丛里传出来的

translation.en: Oh, she fell out of her nest.
Yeah.
We have to put her back.
translation.zh: ‎爸爸 我们得把它放回去

translation.en: -What? -I thought you loved nature.
Yeah, honey, but it's a very tall tree.
translation.zh: ‎是 亲爱的 但这棵树很高耶

translation.en: If you help the birdie, Daddy,
I won't tell anyone I saw you talking on a phone.
translation.zh:
‎我就不会告诉任何人
‎我看到你讲电话了

translation.en: Wait, wait. Ah. [grunts]
[Ellie] Come on, Daddy! Hurry up!
Oh, they're a family again, honey.
translation.zh: ‎它们一家团聚了 亲爱的

translation.en: Yay, Daddy!
It was actually a good idea, honey. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎这其实是个好主意 亲爱的 谢谢你

translation.en: [screams] What's this?
She thinks you're stealing her babies!
We were just trying to help!
Allison, baby!
Allison!
-[Ellie] Come down, Daddy! -I'm coming down, honey!
translation.zh: ‎爸爸 快下来！ ‎我要下去了 宝贝！

translation.en: Ooh. You okay, Daddy?
Yeah, honey.
I'm okay. I'm okay. I'm okay.
I'm okay.
Oh my God! Stop!
Stop! Call your mom!
See? I'm not always a fun killer.
translation.zh: ‎你看 我并不总是个乐趣杀手

translation.en: Well, not today you aren't.
Mom, there's no way you'll make it through the day.
translation.zh: ‎妈 你不可能撑得过一整天的

translation.en: -I'm still saying yes, aren't I? -[Carlos] Call 911!
translation.zh: ‎我一次“不”都没说过耶 ‎快叫救护车！

translation.en: -Allison! -Is that Dad?
Yup, that's him.
Your brother's taking you to get dry ice, right?
translation.zh: ‎放学后你哥会带你去买干冰 对吧？

translation.en: We're good. By the way, so many people are coming tonight.
translation.zh: ‎包在我身上 对了 今晚有好多人会来

translation.en: It's gonna be awesome.
[Nando] Fantastic.
Are you sure you need that much baking soda?
translation.zh: ‎你确定你需要这么多苏打粉吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it's a better catalyst.
Trust me. I'm an expert on catalysts now.
translation.zh: ‎相信我 我现在是催化剂专家了

translation.en: -Allison! Call 911! -I'll have to call you right back.
translation.zh: ‎艾莉森 快叫救护车！ ‎我待会儿再打给你

translation.en: Call 911!
We need a doctor, stat! There's been a horrific bird attack.
translation.zh: ‎我们需要医生 立刻马上！ ‎有人遭到了可怕的鸟袭击！

translation.en: What? Do I have rabies?
No, this hospital sucks, so I exaggerated a little to goose 'em. No pun intended.
translation.zh:
‎不 这家医院太差劲了 ‎所以我夸大了点 让他们倾巢出动
‎没双关意思哦

translation.en: -She's kidding. You're kidding, right? -Sure.
translation.zh: ‎她开玩笑的 你在开玩笑 对吧？ ‎呃 当然

translation.en: Here's a waiting room.
-Katie, you are in charge. -Okay.
Everybody stay with her, so I can find you later.
translation.zh:
‎大家和她待在一起
‎好方便我一会儿找你们

translation.en: -Hurry up! Hurry up! Hurry up! -Stay. It's okay.
translation.zh:
‎-快点！
‎-在这儿待着 没事的

translation.en: Okay, Mr. Torres, you can relax.
translation.zh: ‎好了 托雷斯先生 你可以放松了

translation.en: The scratches are superficial. You'll be fine.
translation.zh: ‎这些抓痕只是皮外伤 你会没事的

translation.en: Oh good. So no concussion, no rabies, no bruises? He's good to go?
translation.zh:
‎太好了 ‎所以没有脑震荡、狂犬病或瘀伤咯？
‎他可以走了？

translation.en: He's in the clear.
-I'll send in a nurse to discharge you. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-我会请护士给你办出院手续
‎-谢谢你

translation.en: -You're okay. That's great. -Yeah.
I will get the kids, and you take your time.
translation.zh: ‎我先去找孩子们 你慢慢来

translation.en: Honey, I hate to be a party pooper, but my body's done.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 我不想扫大家的兴
‎但我身体受不了了

translation.en: Can we finish this another day, please?
translation.zh: ‎我们能改天再继续吗 拜托？

translation.en: Really?
Yeah.
Yeah, I guess if you're not feeling well, of course we'll go home.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 你要是觉得不舒服
‎我们当然可以回家

translation.en: -Thank you. -[Allison] Gosh.
Maybe I'll pop by the office, then go home and crash.
translation.zh:
‎也许我会顺便去一下办公室
‎然后回家倒头大睡

translation.en: -Sorry. What'd you say? -Hm?
Maybe I'll pop by the office.
translation.zh: ‎也许我会顺便去一下办公室

translation.en: So you don't feel well enough to finish this day for our family,
translation.zh:
‎所以你觉得不舒服
‎不能为咱们家完成这一天

translation.en: but you do feel well enough to pop by the office.
It's a little crisis that happened this morning.
Carlos, you want to cancel this day, that's your choice,
translation.zh:
‎卡洛斯 你想取消这一天
‎那是你的选择

translation.en: but you're telling the kids.
[in Spanish] It's your turn to be the bad guy.
Oh, Mrs. T. Hey, get this.
I told Karen I'd give her a Yes Day, and she doesn't even want it.
translation.zh:
‎我跟凯伦说要给她一个有求必应日
‎但她竟然不要

translation.en: We have an ambulance with a siren.
Think of the possibilities.
Grow up, Jean. Seriously.
translation.zh: ‎成熟点吧 吉恩 说认真的

translation.en: How about you lighten up, Karen?
translation.zh: ‎你别那么较真如何 凯伦？

translation.en: Take a chill pill.
Are you okay?
Yeah, I… I just got into a fight with my husband.
translation.zh: ‎还好 我只是刚跟我老公吵架了

translation.en: Ah, and you want me to beat him up?
translation.zh: ‎哦 你想让我揍他一顿吗？

translation.en: No, nothing like that.
[Jean] Give him a wedgie?
No, no. It's just that today was the first day in, like, a year
translation.zh: ‎不是 ‎只是今天是我这一年来第一次觉得

translation.en: where I felt like we were really in it together.
translation.zh: ‎只是今天是我这一年来第一次觉得 ‎我们一家人真的是一条心

translation.en: -[Jean] Yeah. -And then he just had to go and be a wuss.
translation.zh:
‎-明白
‎-但他却非得要当个怂包

translation.en: Sounds like Karen.
She's mad because I took our life savings and bought a fleet of ambulances.
translation.zh:
‎她很生气我用去们的毕生积蓄
‎买了一队救护车

translation.en: I barely know how to drive this one.
But you can't force people to change.
You gotta do what works for you,
and he can either join the party, or it's his loss. You know?
translation.zh:
‎他要么加入
‎不然就是他的损失 知道吧？

translation.en: That's so true.
Hey, guys.
Honey, can I talk to you for a second?
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 能和你谈一下吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
Look, I… I feel real bad.
I don't want to be the spoiler here.
Well, don't feel bad. You are not the spoiler. You do you.
translation.zh: ‎别觉得难受嘛 ‎你不是扫兴鬼 做你想做的

translation.en: You can either come to this party or not.
translation.zh: ‎你可以选择加入 也可以不加入

translation.en: Okay?
Hey guys, let me see what you got. Big ask number four. Let me see.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 让我看看神秘任务四是什么

translation.en: Okay, number four. Putts N' Stuff.
translation.zh: ‎好 任务四 迷你高尔夫游乐园

translation.en: That'd be very cool. We'd have a great time.
translation.zh: ‎不错哦 我们会玩得很开心的

translation.en: But it does not compare
to Magic Mountain!
-What? -Whoo!
But wait. What about the distance rule?
I've decided to make an exception.
And your dad has something he wants to say.
translation.zh: ‎对了 你们爸爸有话想说

translation.en: Go ahead, Dad.
Well, guys, I'm feeling, um…
I'm… I'm feeling a little…
I'm feeling a little bit sick.
You're sick?
Are you going home?
I think I might be coming down with Magic Mountain fever!
translation.zh: ‎我想我可能染上了魔法山乐园热潮！

translation.en: -But how are we gonna get there? -Yeah.
Because the SUV is at the Kablowey field, and even with traffic, it'll take forever.
translation.zh: ‎车还在大混战场那里 ‎再加上交通 也不知何时才能抵达

translation.en: Uh, duh. It's Yes Day!
translation.zh: ‎拜托 今天是有求必应日耶！

translation.en: Are we ready for some roller coaster madness?
translation.zh: ‎大家准备好坐疯狂的过山车了吗？

translation.en: -Yes! -Yeah!
Just so we're clear, if an emergency comes in,
translation.zh: ‎先说清楚 如果有紧急状况的话

translation.en: I gotta leave you on the side of the road.
-What if we're the emergency? -Oh God.
translation.zh:
‎-如果我们就是紧急状况呢？
‎-天啊

translation.en: [chuckles] Good one.
[Jean] Oh boy. Hold on.
All right, you guys can make fun of me if you want, but I brought clean clothes.
translation.zh:
‎好 你们尽管取笑我吧
‎但我带了些干净衣服

translation.en: -Oh my gosh! -Just in case!
-Thank you so much, Mom. -That is a nice mom.
translation.zh:
‎-太谢谢你了 妈
‎-真是个好妈妈

translation.en: I know you hate when I dress you. I took a stab.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你不喜欢我挑的衣服
‎但我尽力了

translation.en: Beats smelling like Kool-Aid, so…
It's Magic Mountain, baby!
[Carlos] Eyes on the road, please.
[Jean] Got it. My bad.
[Jean] Attention, park visitors.
The Torres family is here for this Yes Day,
translation.zh:
‎托雷斯一家
‎是来庆祝今天这个有求必应日的

translation.en: and I want you to say yes and you to say yes. That is right.
translation.zh: ‎我要你们所有人对一切都说“好” ‎没错 除了“好”还是“好”

translation.en: It's all about those yeses, so get ready for some fun!
translation.zh: ‎没错 除了“好”还是“好” ‎所以准备好玩翻天吧！

translation.en: Okay, guys. Can someone bring me a snack?
translation.zh: ‎好 大家 谁能给我拿点零食过来吗？

translation.en: You gotta say yes.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no.
Why did I say yes to this, Katie? [screams]
translation.zh: ‎我为什么要答应玩这个啊 凯蒂？

translation.en: Okay.
-Great. There you go, honey. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-好棒 给你 亲爱的
‎-谢谢你

translation.en: It's really nice to get out of the house, with everyone.
translation.zh: ‎能和大家一起出来玩的感觉真好

translation.en: And we have to do it more 'cause you are growing up.
translation.zh:
‎我们需要更常这么做
‎因为你长得好快

translation.en: We have to take advantage.
I'm gonna get cotton candy. You want some?
translation.zh: ‎我要去买棉花糖 你要吃吗？

translation.en: No. Thanks, honey.
translation.zh: ‎不了 谢谢你 亲爱的

translation.en: -Oh, hey, Katie. Your… Your… -[chimes]
Great.
I need you to text Layla right away
that her cousin isn't taking you to Fleekfest. Your mother is.
translation.zh:
‎告诉她带你们去闪光音乐节的
‎不是她表姐 是你妈妈

translation.en: What?
-Stay here with your sister. Okay? -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-和你妹妹待在这里 好吗？
‎-好

translation.en: She's trying to hook you up with some older guys.
translation.zh: ‎她想给你们介绍些年纪较大的男生

translation.en: -Why were you checking my phone? -You left it there.
translation.zh:
‎-你为什么看我手机？
‎-你把它落在那了

translation.en: You're overreacting because I can't control what Layla sends.
translation.zh:
‎你显然是反应过度了
‎蕾拉想发什么不是我能控制的

translation.en: She was responding to a text you sent. "Guys at my school are so boring."
translation.zh: ‎她是在回复你发的短信 ‎你说“我学校的男生真无聊”

translation.en: You were snooping.
Once I saw the picture, yeah, I opened your phone.
translation.zh: ‎是 我看到照片后 就打开了你的手机

translation.en: Dad, can you please back me up here?
translation.zh: ‎爸 帮我说句话 拜托

translation.en: I know you want your independence. I get that I'm the bummer,
translation.zh:
‎我知道你想要独立
‎我知道我是个扫兴鬼

translation.en: but let me be clear, Katie.
translation.zh: ‎但让我把话说清楚 凯蒂

translation.en: If I don't take you to the concert tonight, you aren't going.
translation.zh:
‎如果今晚带你去演唱会的不是我
‎你就别想去

translation.en: -I'm done with Yes Day. I'm done. -Oh, well, you're grounded.
translation.zh: ‎有求必应日我玩够了 ‎好啊 你被禁足了

translation.en: I can't believe I let you fool me into thinking you actually changed.
translation.zh:
‎真不敢相信
‎我竟然傻到以为你真的变了

translation.en: You really don't trust me.
It isn't about trust. It's about being your parent.
translation.zh: ‎这和信任无关 这和做你妈妈有关

translation.en: Please, give me a break.
What's happening is I don't need you anymore, and you can't handle it.
translation.zh:
‎事实是我不再需要你了
‎而你无法接受

translation.en: [Carlos, in Spanish] Katerina.
Enough.
Take your siblings to the carousel.
[in English] Go now.
[Katie] Guys, come on.
-[Nando] Where are we going? -[Katie] Carousel.
translation.zh: ‎我们要去哪儿？ ‎去玩旋转木马

translation.en: [Nando] This is the best day ever!
-Yay! -Yay! -Yay! -Yay! -[Ellie] Yay! -Yay!
Don't you guys get it?
Mom and Dad are just using this day to take control of us.
translation.zh: ‎爸妈只是想利用这一天来控制我们

translation.en: They think by giving us a Yes Day, we'll do what they want for the rest of our lives.
translation.zh:
‎他们以为只要来个有求必应日
‎我们就会终生任他们摆布

translation.en: Nuh-uh.
Yeah, nuh-uh.
It's all a big con.
If today's just a big con, I hope I get conned for the rest of my life.
translation.zh: ‎如果今天只是个大骗局 ‎我希望能被骗一辈子

translation.en: Yeah. Me too.
Cardinal rule. I shouldn't have looked at her phone.
translation.zh: ‎我犯了大忌 我不应该看她手机的

translation.en: No wonder she was mad.
But it was right there, and there was a picture of a boy.
translation.zh:
‎但手机就在那里
‎而且还有张男孩的照片

translation.en: Ugh, I hate when she hates me.
She doesn't hate you. She's just individuating.
translation.zh: ‎她不恨你 她只是在个体化而已

translation.en: Individuating? It's annoying.
I just hope she understands that it all comes from a place of love.
translation.zh: ‎我希望她明白这一切都是出于爱

translation.en: -I know. -Don't you?
She's just our little girl.
She's not that little.
Look at that gorilla.
It looks like the one Katie used to walk around with.
translation.zh: ‎跟凯蒂以前随身带着的一模一样

translation.en: She called him "Mr. Golilla."
[Carlos] Oh yeah, I remember it got really filthy.
translation.zh: ‎是 我还记得它被弄得脏兮兮的

translation.en: Well, yeah, it had its own car seat.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 它还有自己的安全座椅呢

translation.en: We took it everywhere,
and she was so cute with her pigtails
translation.zh: ‎她扎着小辫子 穿着工装裤

translation.en: and her overalls and a heart on the pocket.
translation.zh: ‎口袋上还印着一颗心 可爱爆了

translation.en: Yeah.
Back when she loved me and was my little buddy.
translation.zh: ‎那时候她还爱我 还是我的小伙伴

translation.en: I know.
-What do you say? You wanna play? -No, it's fine. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎怎么样？想不想玩啊？ ‎不用了 谢谢

translation.en: Carlos, I wanna play. I'm gonna win Katie that gorilla.
translation.zh:
‎卡洛斯 我想玩
‎我要给凯蒂赢那只大猩猩

translation.en: -Then she won't be mean to me. -You sure?
translation.zh:
‎-让她别再对我这么凶
‎-你确定吗？

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
I would like to win that, please.
You'll have to beat this nice lady.
Oh, okay. Hi. How are you?
I need to win this pink gorilla for my daughter, Katie. We're in a fight.
translation.zh: ‎我得给我女儿凯蒂赢这只粉红大猩猩 ‎我们吵架了

translation.en: [scoffs] What if… What if I want to win that gorilla?
translation.zh: ‎如果我也想赢那只大猩猩呢？

translation.en: I already have the blue and brown gorillas.
translation.zh: ‎我已经有蓝色和棕色的大猩猩

translation.en: Now I need a pink one.
Oh. Well, just go easy on me, okay? Just, girl code.
translation.zh: ‎对我手下留情 好吧？姐妹法则嘛

translation.en: -Katie's not five years old anymore, okay? -I know she's not.
translation.zh:
‎-亲爱的 凯蒂已经不是五岁小孩了
‎-我知道

translation.en: When she sees the gorilla,
she'll know I'm her mama and remember everything I've done for her.
translation.zh:
‎她会知道我是她妈妈
‎她会记得我为她做过的一切

translation.en: All right, ready?
-I think that we should go. -Don't distract me. I'm on a mission.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 我想我们还是走吧 ‎别让我分心 我有任务在身

translation.en: Ready?
-[bell rings] -[woman] Toss!
You're going down, lady.
Ooh, it's so close!
This is for driving her retainer three hours to camp.
translation.zh:
‎这下是为了
‎开三小时车去营地给她送牙套

translation.en: This is for peeing every time I sneeze.
translation.zh: ‎这下是为了我每次打喷嚏就漏尿

translation.en: -Will you be quiet? -Okay, let's be good sports.
translation.zh: ‎你安静点行不？ ‎好 大家要有体育精神

translation.en: This is for making me sleep-train you three times.
translation.zh: ‎这下是为了训练你睡觉 训练了三次

translation.en: Shut up!
-It's for my daughter, Katie! -[woman 2] Quiet!
I did it. Don't mess with Mama.
No. No, no.
I won.
What? I just won. I've never won anything. I just won.
translation.zh:
‎-我赢了
‎-你说什么呢？我赢了 ‎我从没赢过什么 但我刚赢了

translation.en: No, I won by, like, a nose.
Come on. We all saw it. She won.
translation.zh: ‎得了吧 大家都看到了 她赢了

translation.en: It was me. I won.
-[Allison] Miss Cheetah? -What?
Can you tell her that I clearly won? I was like a sniper.
translation.zh:
‎你能告诉她我明显赢了吗？
‎我简直像个狙击手

translation.en: I am a freaking sniper, okay?
-No, you are not. I won that gorilla! -Honey!
translation.zh: ‎你才不是 我赢了那只大猩猩！ ‎亲爱的！

translation.en: -I'm staying out of this. -[Carlos] It's not worth it!
translation.zh:
‎-我不插手了
‎-艾莉森 住手 不值得啊！

translation.en: This is my gorilla!
[woman 2] You cheating suburban soccer mom!
Hey! No, don't do this! I got tickets here. Play again, okay?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 不 别这样！ ‎我这里有票 再玩一次嘛

translation.en: I shouldn't have to win it again. You're a lawyer. You know about justice!
translation.zh:
‎我没必要再赢过
‎你是律师 你懂什么叫公正！

translation.en: That's my wife!
Get down!
Security!
[woman 2] You…
No! Lady, please, no!
translation.zh: ‎不 这位女士 求你别这样！

translation.en: Calm down! [grunts]
Why does this keep happening to me? Honey.
translation.zh: ‎我为什么老碰上这种事？亲爱的

translation.en: For my baby, give me the "golilla."
translation.zh: ‎为了我的宝贝 把大晶晶给我吧

translation.en: If you are such a great mother, then where are your kids?
translation.zh:
‎如果你真是那么伟大的妈妈
‎那你的孩子在哪里？

translation.en: No!
Don't talk to me about my kids!
Let go, lady!
-Carlos, get this "golilla" for me! -[Carlos] Let go!
translation.zh:
‎-卡洛斯 快来拿这只大晶晶！
‎-放开！

translation.en: Is that all you got?
It's for my baby!
-Where is that woman? Where is the… -No, honey, stop! No, you…
translation.zh:
‎-那个女人呢？
‎-不 亲爱的 住手！

translation.en: -Who's watching our kids? -I love the law. It's why I'm a lawyer.
translation.zh: ‎谁在照看我们孩子啊？ ‎我也爱法律 所以才成为律师

translation.en: -[officer] Profile. -Ellie usually has a snack around now.
translation.zh:
‎-侧面
‎-这个时候是爱丽的点心时间

translation.en: -[officer] Thumb. -But there are laws, and laws.
-Ma'am? -There are organic smoothies in my bag.
translation.zh:
‎-女士？
‎-我包里有那种有机水果奶昔

translation.en: -Stand still, please. -Oh.
-Can I do that again? -Chin up.
Go ahead, Antonio.
I put the picture of the bad guy right here so that I will find you.
translation.zh:
‎所以我把坏人的照片放在这儿
‎这样我就能找到他

translation.en: -Whatever you look like. -Can you make him bald?
translation.zh:
‎-不管他长什么样
‎-你能让他变成光头吗？

translation.en: Oh, I don't know. Can I
make him bald? You know what I'm saying?
He looks like you.
Wait, what?
I want a beard.
Me too, you know?
Oh, you mean… Oh, yes. Sorry. I should've known. Uh…
translation.zh:
‎-哦 你是说…
‎-对 ‎是 抱歉 我在想什么呢？

translation.en: Let's see. [chuckles]
-Nice soul patch, brother. Snap it. Okay? -[Nando] Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-这山羊胡子不错嘛 兄弟 碰个拳
‎-多谢

translation.en: Do you have mohawks?
-[officer] I do. -Give him a mohawk.
[officer] Okay, wait. Uh, ha, ha!
Can you make him a pirate?
Oh, that's too elaborate, you know?
It would take a really awesome officer to…
[officer] Captain Poopypants right here.
Pirate Town. Pirate Town.
I mean, it was your gorilla, honey.
translation.zh: ‎那是你的大猩猩 亲爱的

translation.en: -Thank you. It was my gorilla. -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢 那确实是我的大猩猩
‎-是

translation.en: I hope you're happy, ya cheater.
translation.zh: ‎这下你高兴了吧 你个作弊鬼？

translation.en: You know what, honey? I don't think you're mad about the gorilla.
translation.zh:
‎你知道吗 亲爱的？
‎我觉得你生气的不是大猩猩的事

translation.en: Really?
Watching you with Katie…
You're amazing.
That's being a parent.
All I've done is force you to do the hard stuff, right?
translation.zh: ‎而我只是一直在逼你做坏人 对吧？

translation.en: You don't need help from a Yes Day.
translation.zh: ‎你根本不需要有求必应日的帮助

translation.en: What you need is a partner.
That's what I'll be from now on,
translation.zh: ‎从现在起 我会在你身边

translation.en: your partner.
[in Spanish] I love you, my love.
[in Spanish] Me too, my love. So much.
translation.zh: ‎我也爱你 亲爱的 我好爱你

translation.en: [in English] Come on. Hey! Good news. We're getting out of your hair.
translation.zh: ‎走吧 嘿！ ‎好消息 我们不用再烦你了

translation.en: -Nana and Pop-Pop came to take us home. -Those are cute nicknames.
translation.zh: ‎爱婆和爱公来接我们回家了 ‎好可爱的昵称哦

translation.en: And really quickly, I just wanted to say how sorry I am
translation.zh: ‎我只想很快地说一下 ‎很遗憾你得以这种方式认识我父母

translation.en: that you had to meet our parents this way. They really are good people,
translation.zh: ‎很遗憾你得以这种方式认识我父母 ‎他们真的是好人 只是判断力差了点

translation.en: just bad judgment.
translation.zh: ‎他们真的是好人 只是判断力差了点

translation.en: Oh, it's not your fault. You hear me?
translation.zh: ‎这不是你的错 听到了吗？

translation.en: Where is Nana and Pop-Pop?
What?
So where is Nana and Pop-Pop?
translation.zh: ‎你们的爱婆和爱公在哪儿呢？

translation.en: They're waiting in the car. Yeah, they're waiting in the car.
translation.zh: ‎他们在车里等着呢 没错

translation.en: Our Pop-Pop's sciatica…
really bad flareup.
Oh Dios mío, no. Oh my God. That sounds terrible. I am so sorry.
translation.zh:
‎我的天哪 听起来糟透了
‎我真的很抱歉

translation.en: -He's brave. Don't make him wait. -We're gonna go. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎他真勇敢 那就别让他等了 ‎好 我们走了 谢谢你

translation.en: I will sign you guys out. Best of luck.
translation.zh: ‎我会签字放你们走 祝你们好运

translation.en: [Katie] Thank you. Bye.
I'll be lonely without you, but don't worry.
translation.zh: ‎没有你们 我会很寂寞的 但别担心

translation.en: I have other friends.
Hey, Julie.
Hey.
Dude, I cannot believe your parents are in jail.
translation.zh: ‎伙计 真不敢相信你父母被抓进牢了

translation.en: It's crazy, right?
Are we really just gonna leave Mom and Dad?
It's not our fault they got put in the clink on our Yes Day.
translation.zh:
‎他们在有求必应日被关进牢房
‎又不是我们的错

translation.en: But we're not supposed to get rides from strangers.
translation.zh: ‎但我们不应该上陌生人的车

translation.en: Okay, well, you guys know Layla,
and Julie is Layla's cousin.
I mean, look, they even put in a car seat.
translation.zh: ‎你看 她们还安装了安全座椅

translation.en: Think of the upside to this.
translation.zh: ‎大家 想想这有什么好处

translation.en: Now your big main event can be even bigger.
translation.zh: ‎这下你们的重头戏可以更夸张了

translation.en: -Awesome. -What is this?
What's with all the tubes and buckets?
translation.zh: ‎那么多管子和水桶是怎么回事？

translation.en: -It's just a nerd party. Hey, guys! -[kids chanting] Nando!
translation.zh:
‎-就只是个学霸派对
‎-南多！ ‎嘿 大家！

translation.en: I feel like this is something that we should have talked…
translation.zh: ‎我觉得这事我们应该事先商量…

translation.en: [Nando] Hey, wait up! Let's get the party started!
translation.zh: ‎嘿 等一下 让派对开始吧！

translation.en: [gasps] You look pretty!
Thanks, Ellie.
[sighs] I can't go.
What?
I can't go.
I'm sorry. I can't leave them. What if something happens?
translation.zh:
‎很抱歉 我不能丢下他们
‎万一出什么事呢？

translation.en: I'm the oldest. It's my responsibility.
translation.zh: ‎我是长女 这是我的责任

translation.en: But you've wanted to go to this concert forever.
translation.zh: ‎但你一直都很想去看这场演唱会

translation.en: And we're gonna be fine. We won't make poor decisions. Promise.
translation.zh:
‎我们会没事的
‎我们绝不会做蠢事 我发誓

translation.en: Promise to text me if something happens?
translation.zh:
‎你发誓
‎如果出事的话会给我发短信？

translation.en: Absolutely.
Come on, Katie. The guys are already there.
translation.zh: ‎来嘛 凯蒂 男孩们已经在那里了

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
Be safe, please.
-[Allison] Are the kids okay? -[officer] Yes.
And I have some phenomenal news.
The park's not pressing charges.
-Thank God. -Yes!
They looked at some security footage, and it turns out you did win the gorilla.
translation.zh:
‎他们看了监控录像
‎发现你确实赢了这只大猩猩

translation.en: I knew it. I knew I won this gorilla. I knew I--
translation.zh:
‎我就知道
‎我就知道我赢了这只大猩猩

translation.en: [Carlos] Okay.
-Does she get to go too? -[officer] In a little bit.
Oh gosh. Here, you have it.
You take the "golilla."
You won it fair and square.
-Thank you. -[officer] Let's go.
Let's go.
-Katie? -[Carlos] Nando?
Ellie? Where are our kids?
Sorry, I forgot to tell you. Nana and Pop-Pop picked them up.
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 忘了告诉你
‎爱婆和爱公把他们接走了

translation.en: Nana and Pop-Pop live in Pittsburgh.
But they're here on vacation?
-No, they're not. -You let our children leave by themselves?
translation.zh: ‎没有 ‎你让我们的孩子自己离开了？

translation.en: You see, when you say it out loud, I… I realize that it was a mistake.
translation.zh:
‎现在听你这么一说
‎我意识到那是个错误了

translation.en: -[gasps] -Oh no.
Can you believe this?
We are actually pulling it off. I'm gonna go check on the big surprise.
translation.zh:
‎我们真的做到了耶
‎我先去看一下大惊喜

translation.en: Yeah. Okay. I'll see you over there, man.
translation.zh: ‎哦 好的 我们一会儿那里见

translation.en: Who's ready to make some science miracles?
translation.zh: ‎谁准备好创造些科学奇迹了？

translation.en: -Name? -Hailey Peterson.
I live across the street.
Sorry, not on the list.
Just kidding. I can't even read. Get on in here.
translation.zh: ‎开玩笑的啦 我又不识字 进来吧

translation.en: -Yes. -[Nando] Are you ready?
[all] Go, Nando! Go, Nando! Go, Nando! Go, Nando! Go, Nando!
Nando's not picking up either.
We know Katie's at Fleekfest, so Nando and Ellie must be at the main event?
translation.zh:
‎我们知道凯蒂去了闪光音乐节
‎那南多和爱丽肯定是在搞重头戏吧？

translation.en: Whatever that is.
Your kids left this here. Do you mean this main event?
translation.zh:
‎他们留下了这个
‎你是说这个重头戏吗？

translation.en: Nerd party. Where would you throw a nerd party?
translation.zh: ‎学霸派对 你会在哪里开学霸派对？

translation.en: He's 11. He's throwing it at home.
We have to divide and conquer here.
I go to the house and shut down the party.
You realize you're gonna have to be a bad guy to a bunch of kids.
translation.zh:
‎你知道你将成为
‎一大帮孩子眼中的坏人吧？

translation.en: I know. I got this.
-Thanks for the extra ticket. -Oh yeah, of course.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你把多余的票给我 ‎哦 不客气

translation.en: Well, my mom can't use it anymore 'cause she's in jail, so…
translation.zh:
‎反正我妈也用不着了
‎因为她在监牢里

translation.en: This is so sick.
-Hey. -[Julie] What's up?
-What's going on? -What's up?
Hi.
-Katie. -Layla.
Chase.
Rob. Killer shirt.
Thank you.
-How's it coming, dude? -Almost done.
translation.zh:
‎-弄得怎么样了 老兄？
‎-快好了

translation.en: Once you get everybody in the backyard, text me, and we'll add the catalyst.
translation.zh:
‎一旦你把所有人都叫到后院
‎就给我发短信 ‎我们就加催化剂

translation.en: -Don't forget the tubes. -I got it.
This is gonna be awesome!
I know.
Tell Nando's mom I'm never having a Yes Day, honey.
translation.zh:
‎告诉南多的妈妈
‎我永远都不会办有求必应日

translation.en: Okay, Mom.
Hey, look, I… I love flaring up my siren and just absolutely flying through town.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 听着
‎我也喜欢拉着警笛在路上狂奔

translation.en: We're going very fast.
But I think maybe you might be overreacting a little bit.
translation.zh: ‎但我觉得你可能反应过度了点

translation.en: This is a girl who is angry with her mother,
and she's meeting up with some skeegy guys who probably have a mustache and need to shave.
translation.zh:
‎并且要去跟一些
‎大概长了满脸胡子的肉渣男会面

translation.en: I don't know if you know anything about teenagers,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道你对青少年了解多少

translation.en: but this is a recipe for putting yourself in a horrible situation.
translation.zh:
‎但这二者结合
‎将致使他们做出些可怕的事

translation.en: I've never heard of "skeegy," but they sound bad.
translation.zh: ‎我没听说过肉渣男 但听起来渣透了

translation.en: -You know what? I won this bet. -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-你知道么？我赢了这场赌约
‎-是

translation.en: I won this ticket fair and square, and she stole it from me.
translation.zh:
‎我堂堂正正赢了这张票
‎她却从我这里偷走

translation.en: I did not say no on Yes Day. That was the deal.
translation.zh: ‎我在有求必应日一次“不”都没说过 ‎我们说好的

translation.en: It's my first actual ride in this car.
-Do you need me to drive? -No, I'm good. I am a grown man.
translation.zh: ‎你需要我来开吗？ ‎不需要 我可是个成年男人

translation.en: [helium voice] Yo! Yo! Yo!
Okay.
-You wanna fight? Let's go! -Hey, guys! Guys, that's not cool.
translation.zh:
‎-你想打架？来啊！
‎-伙计们！ ‎你们别这样

translation.en: I'm gonna get you.
-[Nando] Come on. Stop! -[glass shatters]
You broke the lamp.
Stop!
No! What are you doing?
Come on, Tyler!
Ellie, don't open that.
I love science!
I've never even had soda. My parents don't let me.
translation.zh: ‎我从没喝过汽水 我爸妈不让我喝

translation.en: Ellie!
-[shouting] -This is so awesome!
Stop! We have to get this party under control!
translation.zh: ‎快住手！我们得把这派对控制住！

translation.en: How can that be fun? I thought this was the main event.
translation.zh: ‎那有什么好玩的？这不是重头戏吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it is, but look at this.
translation.zh: ‎是 没错 但你看看这团糟

translation.en: [Nando] Everybody, come to the backyard.
The main event is in the backyard.
[officer] How will we find her? They're all dressed like animals.
translation.zh:
‎要怎么找到她啊？
‎大家都打扮得像毛皮兽

translation.en: -Get to the stage. -Okay.
-Move! Move! Go! Go! -I'm looking for my daughter!
-It's worse than I thought. -My ankles are weak.
translation.zh:
‎-这比我想的还糟
‎-我的脚没力气

translation.en: -Hey. -Where were you?
Julie got us set up at the tent. We're gonna hang there.
translation.zh:
‎朱莉给我们弄到了帐篷
‎我们要去那里呆着

translation.en: Why are we going to a tent?
Come on, Katie. Don't be lame.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 凯蒂 别那么无趣

translation.en: Well, we just met those guys.
They could be shady.
Layla, I can't.
It doesn't feel right.
Guess I'll see you later, then?
-Excuse us, please. -Katie?
-Katie? -[woman] Hey!
Okay. I'm so sorry. She's just freaking out.
translation.zh: ‎好啦 抱歉 她只是担心坏了 好吗？

translation.en: [Allison] I see a security guard.
-Great. -Show him your badge.
-Excuse me, sir? -[officer] Sir?
My daughter is here without my permission. I need to find her.
translation.zh: ‎我女儿未经我的允许就来了 ‎我必须找到她

translation.en: No problem.
I'll just put her photo up on the Jumbotron.
translation.zh: ‎我会把她的照片放到大屏幕上的

translation.en: Thank you so much. Thank you.
He's being sarcastic. Smart aleck.
-Katie Torres? -[singer] Thank you! Good night!
translation.zh:
‎-凯蒂托雷斯？
‎-谢谢 祝大家晚安！

translation.en: I need to get up on that stage.
No, that's where the musicians go, Allison.
No, no, she'll be so angry with me that then she'll have to come down,
translation.zh:
‎不 那会让她非常生气
‎到时她就不得不现身

translation.en: and then we'll have her, and nothing else could go wrong.
translation.zh:
‎我们就能找到她
‎然后就不会出任何事了

translation.en: But what if she hates you forever?
-Okay. -Okay, uh.
What is this miracle powder?
Sugar.
[Hailey] Wow.
[Nando] The main event is out there.
I have a big surprise.
Everybody in the backyard!
Hey, that's my parents' wedding album.
-Who cares? Your parents are in jail. -I said no!
translation.zh: ‎管它呢 反正你父母在坐牢 ‎我说了不行！

translation.en: -I thought it was Yes Day. -Stop!
translation.zh:
‎-今天不是有求必应日么？
‎-放手！

translation.en: Oh no. What have I done?
Time for the surprise!
No! No! Ellie! Come back!
No surprise!
I'm gonna do it.
Ellie, no.
But it's Yes Day.
[Nando] Ellie.
Give me the catalyst.
I wanna see foam.
You will, I promise.
But we just need to attach the tubes so it sprays into the backyard.
translation.zh:
‎但我们得先接上管子
‎让它喷到后院去

translation.en: Okay.
But hurry.
-[fizzing] -[both] No!
-Oh my gosh. -[screaming]
Whoops.
I'm sorry I didn't tighten the lids, but at least it works.
translation.zh:
‎很抱歉我没把盖子拧紧
‎但至少它奏效了

translation.en: Yeah, in the house.
Whoa.
[Nando] My parents are gonna kill me.
Guys, Nando set off a foam bomb upstairs!
translation.zh: ‎大家 南多在楼上点燃了泡沫炸弹！

translation.en: Whoa, it's coming down the stairs.
-[Ellie] It's so much. -Come on, guys.
translation.zh:
‎-这也太多了
‎-来吧 伙计们

translation.en: It's gonna eat us!
Don't worry! It's all simple products you'd find in your kitchen.
translation.zh:
‎别担心 都是些
‎你能在厨房里找到的简单产品

translation.en: Noo!
Fire in the hole!
[Ellie] Go, Nando!
[Nando] Stop! No!
My God!
This is not cool, guys! Come on!
Yeah!
♪ This is gonna be The best day of my life… ♪
No! Stop throwing foam!
Please, stop!
Tasha!
What are you doing in Cleveland?
I'm not Tasha, and we're not in Cleveland. I'm sorry. I gotta go.
translation.zh:
‎我不是塔莎 我们也不在克利夫兰
‎抱歉 我得走了

translation.en: No! No!
Does anybody have a charger? Do you have a charger?
translation.zh: ‎有谁有充电器吗？你们有充电器吗？

translation.en: -I've never been backstage. -We're close.
Stay focused on getting out there.
translation.zh:
‎-我真的好兴奋
‎-专注于走到台上

translation.en: -We need to get past this guy. -[officer] I got it.
translation.zh:
‎-我们只需绕过这家伙
‎-知道了

translation.en: -Whoa, whoa. -Fellow man of the law. I appreciate…
translation.zh: ‎这位执法界同僚 真心感谢…

translation.en: -Should we run past him? -No, definitely not.
translation.zh:
‎-我们要直接冲过去吗？
‎-绝对不行

translation.en: I don't care. Tell him.
I'm like, "We're going on in five minutes."
translation.zh: ‎我说咱们再过五分钟就要上场了

translation.en: And that's H.E.R. Oh, my gosh, it's H.E.R.
-What do you mean? -It's H.E.R.
Capital "H" H.E.R. Oh my God!
We don't care. We're around celebrities all day, so…
translation.zh: ‎我们才不在乎 我们常跟明星打交道

translation.en: Billie, I ripped my top. I need a seamstress, like, ASAP.
translation.zh:
‎比莉 我把上衣划破了
‎你得尽快给我找个女裁缝

translation.en: Yeah. Hey, do we have any seamstresses backstage?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 嘿 我们后台有没有女裁缝？

translation.en: Sure, sure.
At least get me a sewing kit.
-[gasping] -I have a sewing kit.
She's got… We're coming in.
-I have a sewing kit. All the colors. -[officer] She's got it. Very safe.
translation.zh:
‎-我有针线包 真的
‎-没错 ‎-什么颜色都有
‎-非常安全

translation.en: -I can sew it. -You okay with that?
translation.zh:
‎-你愿意的话 我能帮你缝
‎-你可以吧？

translation.en: -Yes! -Fantastic.
-Thank you so much. Thank you. -I got it.
I like to stay prepared. I have three kids.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢有所准备 我有三个孩子

translation.en: You never know when something comes up.
translation.zh: ‎你永远不知道什么时候会有事发生

translation.en: Listen, I have to tell you, my daughter and I are such huge fans
translation.zh:
‎听着 我得告诉你
‎我和我女儿是你的超级粉丝

translation.en: and so grateful for your artistry.
translation.zh: ‎我们真有幸能欣赏你的作品

translation.en: We know everything about you.
-[H.E.R.] Wow. -Like a stalker. [laughs]
Thank you. Thank you so much, and thank you for hooking me up.
translation.zh: ‎真的很谢谢你 ‎也谢谢你帮我这个忙

translation.en: You don't know how much of a lifesaver you are now.
translation.zh: ‎你根本不知道你帮了我多的大忙

translation.en: You should be in good shape. Hang on. Sorry.
translation.zh: ‎应该没问题了 等一下 不好意思

translation.en: There you go.
I am so sorry to bother you, and I hope this isn't inappropriate, but…
translation.zh:
‎很抱歉麻烦你
‎也希望这要求不会太过分 但…

translation.en: I need you to hook me up.
It doesn't look that bad.
-Thanks for the ride, officer. -[officer] Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你送我一程 警官
‎-不客气

translation.en: Nando?
Ellie! What's going on?
Nando!
This party's over!
Stop!
-Stop! -[Nando] Dad!
[shouting] I said stop!
Yay, Daddy!
Kids… [heavy breathing]
…this is my house, and I'm telling you the party's over.
translation.zh: ‎这是我家 ‎我说派对结束了 好吗？

translation.en: Okay? Where do you think you're going?
translation.zh: ‎我说派对结束了 好吗？ ‎你们想去哪？

translation.en: I said the party's over, but the cleanup starts now!
translation.zh:
‎我说派对结束了
‎但清理从现在开始！

translation.en: Start to clean. Now! Gather all the foam! Take it to the backyard.
translation.zh: ‎开始清理 快点！ ‎把泡沫都弄到后院去

translation.en: Come on. Come on, kids.
Go, go, go! Ellie, get off the table, please, my love.
translation.zh: ‎快点！爱丽 从桌上下来 拜托

translation.en: [in Spanish] Come on! Everybody! Help everybody else!
[in English] I'm so incredibly jazzed about tonight.
Yeah. This is my eighth consecutive Fleekfest.
translation.zh:
‎对 这是我连续第八次
‎参加闪光音乐节

translation.en: One year I got sick from nacho cheese,
translation.zh: ‎有一年我吃了太多奶酪酱有点不舒服

translation.en: but other than that, I've been to every one.
translation.zh: ‎但除此之外 我几乎每年都到场

translation.en: That's a lot of people. [scoffs]
I panicked at my karate recital. That was only two people in front of me.
translation.zh:
‎我表演空手道时只有两个观众
‎我都紧张死了

translation.en: Do you have a charger? My phone just died. Sorry.
translation.zh:
‎你有充电器吗？
‎我手机没电了 不好意思

translation.en: Do you have a charger? My phone died. I wanna get home.
translation.zh:
‎你有充电器吗？
‎我手机没电了 我想回家

translation.en: -You wanna go home? -I wanna go home.
translation.zh:
‎-你想回家呀？
‎-对 我想回家

translation.en: -[laughs] -Now you're home.
What? Why would you do that? Why?
We go on in two minutes, so now's your chance.
translation.zh:
‎我们还有两分钟就要上场了
‎所以现在就是你的机会

translation.en: Oh, you're so nice.
Now's your chance. [chuckles]
Okay. Please don't make me regret this. Just go.
translation.zh: ‎好了 拜托别让我后悔 快去

translation.en: Sorry.
I'm so sorry. Hi, I'm just, um…
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 嗨 我只是…

translation.en: I need to find someone, but, um, I… I don't wanna embarrass them.
translation.zh: ‎我需要找个人 但我不想让他们难堪

translation.en: So if you… if you hear my voice and you belong to me…
translation.zh:
‎所以如果你听到我的声音
‎如果你属于我…

translation.en: I'm looking for my phone. Sorry, guys.
translation.zh: ‎我只是在找我手机 不好意思

translation.en: -Sorry, I'm looking for my phone. -[woman] Watch it!
translation.zh:
‎-不好意思 我在找手机
‎-看着点！

translation.en: [man] Yo, what are you doing?
You've got this. [chuckles]
She does not have this. She is not breathing, and she's paralyzed.
translation.zh: ‎她不行 她没在呼吸 她僵住了

translation.en: -I wanna go home. -[man 1] Seriously?
-[man 2] Try and calm down, please? -[man 3] Grow up!
translation.zh:
‎-试着冷静点 拜托
‎-成熟点吧

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause, Katie, I love you ♪
Mom!
-Mom! -♪ All your loving ♪
Mom!
Katie!
Thank you. Katie?
Oh, honey.
I am so sorry. [sobbing]
You were right about this place. [sobbing]
You are the best mom.
I'm sorry.
[Allison] Oh, I love you.
Honey. [cries]
We gotta follow that?
I'm scared.
Guys, relax.
Just go with it.
I'm really sorry about what I said.
Ugh, don't worry.
Worse has been said to moms.
It's hard to let you grow up. [cries]
That's the truth.
It's just hard for moms.
It would've been way more fun to come with you anyway.
translation.zh: ‎反正和你一起来的话会更好玩

translation.en: -Really? [laughs] -Yeah.
Well, I… I came anyway.
Oh, my tears. They're gonna make my glitter fall off.
translation.zh: ‎哦 我的眼泪快把我的亮片都弄掉了

translation.en: Ugh, I spent about two hours putting this bedazzle on.
translation.zh: ‎这身闪亮亮的打扮可花了我约两小时

translation.en: Are you guys gonna help me finish this song or what?
translation.zh: ‎你们还打不打算帮我完成这首歌了？

translation.en: I think she's talking to you, Mom.
-[Allison] No. -H.E.R. is calling you on stage.
-[chuckles] No. -You have to go.
I was talking to both of you.
Get up here.
All of us?
Just them, okay.
Wanna do it?
Yeah, let's do it.
Sing it!
Go, Tasha!
I'm by myself. Okay, cool.
Wolfie, I love you, man!
Yeah, back at you!
Be careful with those beakers. They're going back to school.
translation.zh: ‎小心那些烧杯 要归还给学校的

translation.en: Guys, I told you to take all that stuff out.
translation.zh: ‎各位 我让你们把这些东西都拿出去

translation.en: Take it out, now. All of it.
And just keep, you know, scrubbing.
No slacking off, okay? I see you.
Whoa, Dad.
You became, like, a scary dad back there.
Yeah?
Well, I mean, that's…
Sometimes you gotta put your foot down,
even with the ones you love, like you.
translation.zh: ‎即使是对自己爱的人 比如你

translation.en: No, it was pretty cool. I didn't know you actually had it in you.
translation.zh: ‎不 那挺酷的 ‎我没想到你还有这一面

translation.en: [Carlos] Come here.
-You're still grounded. You know that? -Oh, yeah, super grounded.
translation.zh: ‎你还是被禁足了 你知道吧？ ‎当然 跑不掉了

translation.en: You got the point. Hey, no slacking off.
translation.zh: ‎你知道就好 嘿 不准偷懒！

translation.en: The whole thing. The whole thing. The whole column. Go.
translation.zh: ‎整个 整个柱子都要擦 快擦

translation.en: Hey.
[Allison] Hi, honey.
[chuckles] Hey! Oh, baby. I'm so glad you're okay.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 ‎哦 宝贝 你没事真是太好了

translation.en: I wanna be a scientist, too, and blow things up.
translation.zh: ‎我也想成为科学家 然后搞爆炸

translation.en: -[Allison] You want to blow things up? -Yeah.
It looks like you got a lot of practice tonight.
translation.zh: ‎看来你今晚做了不少练习嘛

translation.en: Nando, how could you let this happen?
translation.zh: ‎南多 你怎么能让这种事发生？

translation.en: You said you'd text if anything went wrong.
translation.zh: ‎你说过出事的话会给我发短信的

translation.en: How could you let this happen? You're the oldest, Katie.
translation.zh: ‎你怎么能让这种事发生？ ‎你是长女 凯蒂

translation.en: Everything they did while you were at that concert is your responsibility too.
translation.zh:
‎他们在你去演唱会时所做的一切
‎也是你的责任

translation.en: I should ground you for twice as long as Nando.
translation.zh: ‎你的禁足期限应该是南多的两倍

translation.en: If it makes you feel better, I was worried sick the whole time.
translation.zh:
‎如果这么说能让你感觉好点
‎我整晚都担心死了

translation.en: Like mother, like daughter, huh?
Now help your brother clean.
It's not so bad being the bad guy.
Wow.
Is it crazy I'm already looking forward to our next Yes Day?
translation.zh:
‎我已经开始期待下一个有求必应日了
‎是不是很疯狂？

translation.en: No, no, no, the day is not over yet. I still have one more thing I wanna do.
translation.zh: ‎不 这一天还没结束 ‎我还有一件事想做

translation.en: Hashtag, "Winning."
I cannot believe you stole this gorilla.
translation.zh: ‎我真不敢相信你偷了这只大猩猩

translation.en: She didn't steal it. She won it square and fair.
translation.zh:
‎可不是偷来的
‎是她正正堂堂赢回来的

translation.en: Square and fair. I did.
-My turn. -[Katie] Thank you, Mom.
-[Carlos] Why can't I get my feet? -[Allison] Carlos, come on.
translation.zh:
‎-我为什么碰不到我的脚啊？
‎-卡洛斯 加油

translation.en: -Right on my face. -[laughing]
Nando, why do I feel like you're gonna break my nose?
translation.zh:
‎南多 我怎么觉得
‎你会砸伤我的鼻子？

translation.en: That's the only thing I haven't broken today.
translation.zh: ‎那是我今天唯一没伤到的东西

translation.en: -[kisses] -I love you, Mama.
I love you, baby.
[Carlos] Nando, are you sure you got rid of all the catalyst?
translation.zh:
‎南多 你确定
‎你把所有的催化剂都扔了？

translation.en: [Nando] Yep. I flushed it down the toilet.
-[Carlos] What? -[Ellie] What's that sound?
[Allison] I hope that's rain.
[Ellie] Mama, look! More foam!
-[Nando] Whoops. -[Katie gasps] Oh no!
[Allison and Carlos] Nando!
♪ 'Cause today's gonna be my day ♪ ♪ I just wanna climb ♪
translation.zh:
‎（改编自艾米克劳斯罗森塔尔
‎和汤姆利希腾赫德的小说）

translation.en: -Ah. Ah. -[Nando] Three! -Ow! Ow! -[Nando] Two! [Nando] One!
Nando, why?
I didn't sign up for this!
They'll never catch me.
I'm like a gazelle!
Yes Day forever!
